9341331Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static _24bit[][] GetBitmapPixelsFrom24bpp(BitmapData data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(data == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("data");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var bitmapRows = new _24bit[rows][];Di2015NewLine    for(int row = 0; row < data.Height; ++r)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bitmapRows[row] = new _24bit[data.Width];Di2015NewLine        for(int pixel = 0; pixel < data.Width; ++pixel)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte b = Marshal.ReadByte(data.Scan0, data.Stride * row + pixel * 3 + 0);Di2015NewLine            byte g = Marshal.ReadByte(data.Scan0, data.Stride * row + pixel * 3 + 1);Di2015NewLine            byte r = Marshal.ReadByte(data.Scan0, data.Stride * row + pixel * 3 + 2);Di2015NewLine            var bitmapPixel = new _24bit();Di2015NewLine            bitmapPixel._value[0] = b;Di2015NewLine            bitmapPixel._value[1] = g;Di2015NewLine            bitmapPixel._value[2] = r;Di2015NewLine            bitmapRows[row][pixel] = bitmapPixel;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return bitmapRows;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9343213Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// A control that changes appearance when it is hovered over and triggers some effect when it is clickedDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class EnigmaButtonDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The method signature for notification when a button is clickedDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sender">EnigmaButton that was clicked</param>Di2015NewLine    public delegate void OnClickEvent(EnigmaButton sender);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Types of textures used for Enigma ButtonsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public enum TextureType { Normal, Over, Press }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region VariablesDi2015NewLineprotected IVisualExposer m_ui;Di2015NewLineprotected Rectangle m_bounds;Di2015NewLine    IInputExposer m_input;Di2015NewLine    bool m_over = false, m_press = false, m_wasPressed = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dictionary<TextureType, EnigmaResource<Texture2D>> m_textures;Di2015NewLine    string m_text, m_name;Di2015NewLine    EnigmaResource<SpriteFont> m_font;Di2015NewLine    int m_minTextShadow, m_maxTextShadow;Di2015NewLine    Color m_textTint;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event OnClickEvent OnClick;Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A control that changes appearance when it is hovered over and triggers some effect when it is clickedDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="ui">Graphical assets</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="input">Input exposer for mouse input and XBox controller input</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="reader">XMLReader for the definition of the controller</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="pos">Bounds of the controller</param>Di2015NewLine    public EnigmaButton(IVisualExposer ui, IInputExposer input, XmlReader reader, Rectangle pos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    m_ui = ui;Di2015NewLine    m_bounds = pos;Di2015NewLine        m_textures = new Dictionary<TextureType, EnigmaResource<Texture2D>>();Di2015NewLine        m_input = input;Di2015NewLine        Enabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region ReadingDi2015NewLine        string name;Di2015NewLine        bool started = false, insideText = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (reader.MoveToContent() == XmlNodeType.Element)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                name = reader.Name.ToLower();Di2015NewLine                if (name == "button")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (started)Di2015NewLine                        throw new Exception("Already started.");Di2015NewLine                    started = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    m_name = reader.GetAttribute("name") ?? string.Empty;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (!started)Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("Not started");Di2015NewLine                else if (name == "text")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    m_font = new EnigmaResource<SpriteFont>();Di2015NewLine                    m_font.Filepath = reader.GetAttribute("font");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    string minShadow = reader.GetAttribute("minShadow"), maxShadow = reader.GetAttribute("maxShadow");Di2015NewLine                    m_minTextShadow = minShadow != null ? int.Parse(minShadow) : 0;Di2015NewLine                    m_maxTextShadow = maxShadow != null ? int.Parse(maxShadow) : 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    m_text = reader.GetAttribute("text") ?? string.Empty;Di2015NewLine                    insideText = true;Di2015NewLine                    m_textTint = Color.White;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (name == "bounds")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    insideText = false;Di2015NewLine                    m_bounds = new Rectangle(int.Parse(reader.GetAttribute("x")), int.Parse(reader.GetAttribute("y")),Di2015NewLine                        int.Parse(reader.GetAttribute("width")), int.Parse(reader.GetAttribute("height")));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (name == "texture")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    insideText = false;Di2015NewLine                    TextureType texType = (TextureType)Enum.Parse(typeof(TextureType), reader.GetAttribute("type"));Di2015NewLine                    if (m_textures.ContainsKey(texType))Di2015NewLine                        throw new Exception("A texture of type '" + texType.ToString() + "' cannot  be registered twice");Di2015NewLine                    EnigmaResource<Texture2D> res = new EnigmaResource<Texture2D>();Di2015NewLine                    res.Filepath = reader.ReadString();Di2015NewLine                    m_textures.Add(texType, res);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (name == "tint")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!insideText)Di2015NewLine                        throw new Exception("Tints can only be for text");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    float a, r, g, b;Di2015NewLine                    string[] split = reader.ReadString().Split(',');Di2015NewLine                    if (split.Length != 4)Di2015NewLine                        throw new Exception("Colors must be RGBA");Di2015NewLine                    r = float.Parse(split[0].Trim());Di2015NewLine                    g = float.Parse(split[1].Trim());Di2015NewLine                    b = float.Parse(split[2].Trim());Di2015NewLine                    a = float.Parse(split[3].Trim());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    m_textTint = new Color(r, g, b, a);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!m_textures.ContainsKey(TextureType.Normal))Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("A button must have at least a '" + TextureType.Normal.ToString() + "' texture");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region MethodsDi2015NewLine    public void Initialize()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void LoadContent()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EnigmaResource<Texture2D> res;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < m_textures.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            res = m_textures[m_textures.ElementAt(i).Key];Di2015NewLine            res.Resource = m_ui.Content.Load<Texture2D>(res.Filepath);Di2015NewLine            m_textures[m_textures.ElementAt(i).Key] = res;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (m_font.Filepath != null)Di2015NewLine            m_font.Resource = m_ui.Content.Load<SpriteFont>(m_font.Filepath);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Update(GameTime gameTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_wasPressed = m_press;Di2015NewLine        m_over = m_bounds.Contains(m_input.MouseX, m_input.MouseY);Di2015NewLine        m_press = m_over ? m_wasPressed ? m_input.IsMouseLeftPressed || m_input.IsButtonPressed(Buttons.A) : m_input.IsMouseLeftTriggered || m_input.IsButtonTriggered(Buttons.A) : false;Di2015NewLine        if (!m_wasPressed && m_press && OnClick != null)Di2015NewLine            OnClick(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Draw(GameTime gameTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Texture2D toDraw = m_textures[TextureType.Normal].Resource;Di2015NewLine        if (Enabled)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m_press && m_textures.ContainsKey(TextureType.Press))Di2015NewLine                toDraw = m_textures[TextureType.Press].Resource;Di2015NewLine            else if (m_over && m_textures.ContainsKey(TextureType.Over))Di2015NewLine                toDraw = m_textures[TextureType.Over].Resource;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        m_ui.SpriteBatch.Draw(toDraw, m_bounds, Enabled ? Color.White : Color.Gray);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (m_font.Resource != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Vector2 pos = new Vector2(m_bounds.X, m_bounds.Y);Di2015NewLine            Vector2 size = m_font.Resource.MeasureString(m_text);Di2015NewLine            pos.X += (m_bounds.Width - size.X) / 2;Di2015NewLine            pos.Y += (m_bounds.Height - size.Y) / 2;Di2015NewLine            UIHelper.DrawShadowedString(m_ui, m_font.Resource, m_text, pos, m_textTint, m_minTextShadow, m_maxTextShadow);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region PropertiesDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets or sets the name of the buttonDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public string NameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return m_name; }Di2015NewLine        set { m_name = value ?? m_name; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets or sets the text drawn in the button.Di2015NewLine    /// WARNING: Will overflow if the text does not normally fit.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public string TextDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return m_text; }Di2015NewLine        set { m_text = value ?? string.Empty; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets or sets the bounds of the buttonDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public Rectangle BoundsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return m_bounds; }Di2015NewLine        set { m_bounds = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Whether or not the control is enabledDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic bool Enabled { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9347211Di2015UniqueSeparator    using System.IO;Di2015NewLine    using System.Security;Di2015NewLine    using System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLine    using System.Runtime.InteropServices;   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // <summary>  Di2015NewLine    // Encrypts a string          Di2015NewLine    // </summary>        Di2015NewLine    // <param name="CipherText">Text to be Encrypted</param>         Di2015NewLine    // <param name="Password">Password to Encrypt with</param>         Di2015NewLine    // <param name="Salt">Salt to Encrypt with</param>          Di2015NewLine    // <param name="HashAlgorithm">Can be either SHA1 or MD5</param>         Di2015NewLine    // <param name="PasswordIterations">Number of iterations to do</param>          Di2015NewLine    // <param name="InitialVector">Needs to be 16 ASCII characters long</param>          Di2015NewLine    // <param name="KeySize">Can be 128, 192, or 256</param>          Di2015NewLine    // <returns>A decrypted string</returns>       Di2015NewLine    public static string AESEncrypt(string PlainText, string Password, string Salt, string HashAlgorithm, int PasswordIterations, string InitialVector, int KeySize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(PlainText))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "The Text to be Decryped by AES must not be null...";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "The Password for AES Decryption must not be null...";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        byte[] InitialVectorBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(InitialVector);Di2015NewLine        byte[] SaltValueBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(Salt);Di2015NewLine        byte[] PlainTextBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(PlainText);Di2015NewLine        PasswordDeriveBytes DerivedPassword = new PasswordDeriveBytes(Password, SaltValueBytes, HashAlgorithm, PasswordIterations);Di2015NewLine        byte[] KeyBytes = DerivedPassword.GetBytes(KeySize / 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RijndaelManaged SymmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SymmetricKey.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] CipherTextBytes = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (ICryptoTransform Encryptor = SymmetricKey.CreateEncryptor(KeyBytes, InitialVectorBytes))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (MemoryStream MemStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (CryptoStream CryptoStream = new CryptoStream(MemStream, Encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    CryptoStream.Write(PlainTextBytes, 0, PlainTextBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                    CryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine                    CipherTextBytes = MemStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                    MemStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                    CryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        SymmetricKey.Clear();Di2015NewLine        return Convert.ToBase64String(CipherTextBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // <summary>  Di2015NewLine    // Decrypts a string          Di2015NewLine    // </summary>        Di2015NewLine    // <param name="CipherText">Text to be decrypted</param>         Di2015NewLine    // <param name="Password">Password to decrypt with</param>         Di2015NewLine    // <param name="Salt">Salt to decrypt with</param>          Di2015NewLine    // <param name="HashAlgorithm">Can be either SHA1 or MD5</param>         Di2015NewLine    // <param name="PasswordIterations">Number of iterations to do</param>          Di2015NewLine    // <param name="InitialVector">Needs to be 16 ASCII characters long</param>          Di2015NewLine    // <param name="KeySize">Can be 128, 192, or 256</param>          Di2015NewLine    // <returns>A decrypted string</returns>        Di2015NewLine    public static string AESDecrypt(string CipherText, string Password, string Salt, string HashAlgorithm, int PasswordIterations, string InitialVector, int KeySize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(CipherText))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "The Text to be Decryped by AES must not be null...";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "The Password for AES Decryption must not be null...";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        byte[] InitialVectorBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(InitialVector);Di2015NewLine        byte[] SaltValueBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(Salt);Di2015NewLine        byte[] CipherTextBytes = Convert.FromBase64String(CipherText);Di2015NewLine        PasswordDeriveBytes DerivedPassword = new PasswordDeriveBytes(Password, SaltValueBytes, HashAlgorithm, PasswordIterations);Di2015NewLine        byte[] KeyBytes = DerivedPassword.GetBytes(KeySize / 8);Di2015NewLine        RijndaelManaged SymmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine        SymmetricKey.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLine        byte[] PlainTextBytes = new byte[CipherTextBytes.Length];Di2015NewLine        int ByteCount = 0;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (ICryptoTransform Decryptor = SymmetricKey.CreateDecryptor(KeyBytes, InitialVectorBytes))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (MemoryStream MemStream = new MemoryStream(CipherTextBytes))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (CryptoStream CryptoStream = new CryptoStream(MemStream, Decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ByteCount = CryptoStream.Read(PlainTextBytes, 0, PlainTextBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                        MemStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                        CryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "Please Enter the Correct Password and Salt..." + "The Following Error Occured: " + "/n" + e;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        SymmetricKey.Clear();Di2015NewLine        return Encoding.UTF8.GetString(PlainTextBytes, 0, ByteCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9349858Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass BitmapWrapperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly int hash;Di2015NewLine    public Bitmap Image { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public BitmapWrapper(Bitmap img)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Image = img;Di2015NewLine        this.hash = this.ComputeHash();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int ComputeHash()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // you could turn this code into something unsafe to speed-up GetPixelDi2015NewLine        // e.g. using lockbits etc...Di2015NewLine        unchecked // Overflow is fine, just wrapDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int h = 17;Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < this.Image.Size.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine                for (int y = 0; y < this.Image.Size.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine                    h = h * 23 + this.Image.GetPixel(x, y).GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine            return h;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var objBitmap = obj as Bitmap;Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        // use CompareMemCmp in case of hash collisions Di2015NewLine        return Utils.CompareMemCmp(this.Image, objBitmap); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9352740Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AudioManager : IDisposable {Di2015NewLine    const int playbackFreq = 44100;Di2015NewLine    const int samples = 2048;Di2015NewLine    const double pi2 = 360 * Math.PI / 180.0;Di2015NewLine    private bool disposed = false;Di2015NewLine    private bool initialized = false;Di2015NewLine    SdlDotNet.Audio.AudioStream stream;Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double time = 0;Di2015NewLine    double volume;Di2015NewLine    double frequency1 = -1;Di2015NewLine    double frequency2 = -1;Di2015NewLine    SdlDotNet.Audio.AudioCallback audioCallback = new SdlDotNet.Audio.AudioCallback(Callback)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public AudioManager()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        stream = new SdlDotNet.Audio.AudioStream(playbackFreq, Di2015NewLine                             SdlDotNet.Audio.AudioFormat.Unsigned8, Di2015NewLine                             SdlDotNet.Audio.SoundChannel.Mono, Di2015NewLine                             samples, Di2015NewLine                             audioCallback, Di2015NewLine                             null);Di2015NewLine        buffer8 = new byte[samples];Di2015NewLine        volume = 1.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // BUG: OpenAudio (or lower) apparently requires a visible screen for some reason:Di2015NewLine        SdlDotNet.Graphics.Video.SetVideoMode(1, 1);Di2015NewLine        SdlDotNet.Audio.Mixer.OpenAudio(stream);Di2015NewLine        // BUG: close (or hide) itDi2015NewLine        SdlDotNet.Graphics.Video.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void beep(double duration, double freq) {Di2015NewLine        frequency1 = freq;Di2015NewLine        frequency2 = -1;Di2015NewLine        Tao.Sdl.Sdl.SDL_PauseAudio(0);Di2015NewLine        Tao.Sdl.Sdl.SDL_Delay((int)(duration * 1000));Di2015NewLine        Tao.Sdl.Sdl.SDL_PauseAudio(1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Callback(IntPtr userData, IntPtr stream, int len)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double slice = 1.0 / playbackFreq * pi2; Di2015NewLine        for (int buf_pos = 0; buf_pos < len; buf_pos++ )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            buffer8[buf_pos] = (byte)(127 + Math.Cos(time) * volume * 127);Di2015NewLine            time += frequency1 * slice;Di2015NewLine            if (time > pi2)Di2015NewLine                time -= pi2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(buffer8, 0, stream, len);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9356446Di2015UniqueSeparatorint
9356446Di2015UniqueSeparatoroutputSize
9356446Di2015UniqueSeparatortestString()
9356446Di2015UniqueSeparator int testString(char *output, int outputSize)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    std::string const & s = getString();Di2015NewLine    if ( s.size() <= outputSize )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        std::strncpy(output, s.c_str(), s.size());Di2015NewLine        return s.size(); //return the actual size of outputDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else //means s.size() > outputSize, i.e outputSize is smaller than required!Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        std::strncpy(output, s.c_str(), outputSize);Di2015NewLine        return s.size(); //return what is required (the actual size of output)!Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
9356446Di2015UniqueSeparator[DllImport("MyDLL.dll", CallingConvention = CallingConvention.Cdecl)]Di2015NewLineprivate static extern int testString(out StringBuilder output, int outputSize); Di2015NewLine
9356446Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string ReturnSomething()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   int bufferSize = 100;Di2015NewLine   StringBuilder buffer= new StringBuilder(bufferSize);Di2015NewLine   int outputSize = TestImport.testString(buffer, bufferSize);Di2015NewLine   if ( outputSize < bufferSize )  //output bufferSize was sufficientDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine        return buffer.ToString();Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   else //output bufferSize was insufficient Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine        //retry!Di2015NewLine        bufferSize = outputSize;Di2015NewLine        buffer = new StringBuilder(bufferSize); //reallocate!Di2015NewLine        outputSize = TestImport.testString(buffer, bufferSize); Di2015NewLine        if ( outputSize <= bufferSize )Di2015NewLine             return buffer.ToString();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("PANIC");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9359133Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Category object for loggingDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class CategoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region Private MembersDi2015NewLine    private bool    m_active;Di2015NewLine    private string  m_name;Di2015NewLine    private bool    m_excludeFromLogFile = false;Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Create a category and add it to the Logging category listDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="name">The Name of the category</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="active">The active state of the category</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="exclude">If true any messages for this category will not be written to the log file</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="addedToList">If true then the new category will be added to the logging category list</param>Di2015NewLine    public Category(string name, bool active, bool exclude, bool addedToList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_name = name;Di2015NewLine        m_active = active;Di2015NewLine        m_excludeFromLogFile = exclude;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(addedToList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Log.GetInstance().AddCategory(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Public Accessor MethodsDi2015NewLine        // .. 9359133Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Add a new category to the list of available categoriesDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="newCat">The category object to add</param>Di2015NewLinepublic void AddCategory( Category newCat )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Ensure that the category doesn't already exist in the listDi2015NewLine    if( this.m_CategoryList.Contains( newCat ) == false )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Add the new category to the listDi2015NewLine        this.m_CategoryList.Add( newCat );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Remove a category to the list of available categoriesDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="catName">The name of the category to be removed</param>Di2015NewLinepublic void RemoveCategory( string catName )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Category toRemove = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Iterate through the categories looking for a matchDi2015NewLine    foreach( Category cat in this.m_CategoryList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Compare the category names (case insensitive)Di2015NewLine        if( cat.Name.ToUpper() == catName.ToUpper() )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Assign the category to remove to a local variable and exit the loopDi2015NewLine            toRemove = cat;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Remove the category if it's been locatedDi2015NewLine    if( toRemove != null )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.m_CategoryList.Remove( toRemove );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9359133Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Create a log entry in the log file and then Fire an event for the log message to be handledDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="category">The category to log the message against</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="args"> Message logging arguments used by the event</param>Di2015NewLinepublic void WriteLine(Category category, MessageEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Ensure that the category specified exists in the array listDi2015NewLine    if( this.m_CategoryList.Contains( category ) )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Ensure the category is active Di2015NewLine        if(category.Active == true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(!category.ExcludeFromLogFile)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Try and log the message to the log fileDi2015NewLine                this.WriteLineToFile( category, args );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Ensure an event handler has been assignedDi2015NewLine            if(MessageEvent != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // This message event is handled by the UI thread for updating screen components.Di2015NewLine                MessageEvent(category, args);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9359133Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ListViewLogging_MessageEvent(Category category, MessageEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Ensure the event was received in the UI threadDi2015NewLine    if(this.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(args.Message != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We aren't in the UI thread so reFire the event using the main threadDi2015NewLine            this.BeginInvoke(new MessageReceivedDelegate(this.ListViewLogging_MessageEvent), new object[]{category,args});Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // We are currently in the main thread.Di2015NewLine        // Lock so no other thread can be handled until event processing has been finishedDi2015NewLine        lock(this)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Create a new ListView item for the new message Di2015NewLine            ListViewItem newEntry = null;;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Determine the category typeDi2015NewLine            switch( category.Name )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case "Serious":Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Serious error detectedDi2015NewLine                    if( args.Message.Length > 0 )Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        newEntry = new ListViewItem( new string[]{category.Name, args.Occurred.ToLongTimeString(), args.Message} );Di2015NewLine                        newEntry.BackColor = Color.Red;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                case "Warning":Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Warning detected.Di2015NewLine                    if( args.Message.Length > 0 )Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        newEntry = new ListViewItem( new string[]{category.Name, args.Occurred.ToLongTimeString(), args.Message} );Di2015NewLine                        newEntry.BackColor = Color.Orange;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                case "Progress":Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // If a message has been specified, log itDi2015NewLine                    if( args.Message.Length > 0 )Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        newEntry = new ListViewItem( new string[]{"", args.Occurred.ToLongTimeString(), args.Message} );Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                case "Debug":Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Just a standard Debug event so just display the text on the screenDi2015NewLine                    if( args.Message.Length > 0 )Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        newEntry = new ListViewItem( new string[]{category.Name, args.Occurred.ToLongTimeString(), args.Message} );Di2015NewLine                        newEntry.BackColor = Color.LightGreen;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                case "Info":Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Just a standard event so just display the text on the screenDi2015NewLine                    if( args.Message.Length > 0 )Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        newEntry = new ListViewItem( new string[]{category.Name, args.Occurred.ToLongTimeString(), args.Message} );Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // Add the item if it's been populatedDi2015NewLine            if( newEntry != null )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.Items.Add( newEntry );Di2015NewLine                this.EnsureVisible( this.Items.Count-1 );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9359419Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] data = Serialize("Some arbitrary test data", "pass");Di2015NewLine        object x = Deserialize(data, "pass");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(x);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static SymmetricAlgorithm CreateCryptoServiceProvider(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] passwordHash;Di2015NewLine        using (MD5 md5 = MD5.Create())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // It's not clear why you're taking the hash of the password...Di2015NewLine            passwordHash = md5.ComputeHash(Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var crypt = new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine        crypt.Key = passwordHash;Di2015NewLine        crypt.Mode = CipherMode.CBC; // This is the default anyway - can removeDi2015NewLine        crypt.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7; // DittoDi2015NewLine        // Fix this to use a randomly generated one and store it for real code.Di2015NewLine        crypt.IV = new byte[crypt.BlockSize / 8];Di2015NewLine        return crypt;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static byte[] Serialize(object obj, string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var provider = CreateCryptoServiceProvider(key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream memory = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (CryptoStream stream = new CryptoStream(Di2015NewLine                memory, provider.CreateEncryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                BinaryFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine                formatter.Serialize(stream, obj);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return memory.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static object Deserialize(byte[] inBytes, string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var provider = CreateCryptoServiceProvider(key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream memory = new MemoryStream(inBytes))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (CryptoStream stream = new CryptoStream(Di2015NewLine                memory, provider.CreateDecryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Read))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                BinaryFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine                return formatter.Deserialize(stream);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9359519Di2015UniqueSeparator        public Post GetPageOwner(int pageid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var posts = (from dp in db.Posts where dp.pageid == pageid select dp);Di2015NewLine        var returned = posts;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (posts.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var latest = posts.OrderByDescending(o => o.Date).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine            var sharedsamedayaslatest = (posts.Where(p => p.Date.AddDays(1) >= latest.Date));Di2015NewLine            if (sharedsamedayaslatest.Count() > 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var followedpost = (posts.SelectMany(p => db.Subscriptions, (p, s) => new {p, s}).Where(Di2015NewLine                    @t => s.Subscriber == UID && s.Subscribedto == p.UserId).Select(@t => p));Di2015NewLine                var count = followedpost.Count();Di2015NewLine                if (count == 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    returned = followedpost;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (count > 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    returned = (followedpost.Select(s => new {s, reposts = GetPostReposts(s.id)}).Select(Di2015NewLine                        @t => new {@t, rating = GetPostRating(s.id)}).Select(Di2015NewLine                            @t => new {@t, score = reposts + rating}).OrderByDescending(@t => score).Select(@t => s));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //no follower shared this post so return the most likedDi2015NewLine                    (sharedsamedayaslatest.Select(s => new {s, reposts = GetPostReposts(s.id)}).Select(Di2015NewLine                        @t => new {@t, rating = GetPostRating(s.id)}).Select(Di2015NewLine                            @t => new {@t, score = reposts + rating}).OrderByDescending(@t => score).Select(@t => s)) = returned;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //no shares on the day the latest shareDi2015NewLine                returned = sharedsamedayaslatest;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //only one postDi2015NewLine            returned = posts;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return returned.FirstOrDefault(); //order by userid gets a random oneDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

this.Height - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Color frmColor = this.Parent.BackColor;Di2015NewLine            Brush bckColor = default(Brush);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            alpha = (m_opacity * 255) / 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (drag)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Color dragBckColor = default(Color);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (BackColor != Color.Transparent)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int Rb = BackColor.R * alpha / 255 + frmColor.R * (255 - alpha) / 255;Di2015NewLine                    int Gb = BackColor.G * alpha / 255 + frmColor.G * (255 - alpha) / 255;Di2015NewLine                    int Bb = BackColor.B * alpha / 255 + frmColor.B * (255 - alpha) / 255;Di2015NewLine                    dragBckColor = Color.FromArgb(Rb, Gb, Bb);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dragBckColor = frmColor;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                alpha = 255;Di2015NewLine                bckColor = new SolidBrush(Color.FromArgb(alpha, dragBckColor));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bckColor = new SolidBrush(Color.FromArgb(alpha, this.BackColor));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (this.BackColor != Color.Transparent | drag)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                g.FillRectangle(bckColor, bounds);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bckColor.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            g.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            base.OnPaint(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnBackColorChanged(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (this.Parent != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Parent.Invalidate(this.Bounds, true);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            base.OnBackColorChanged(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnParentBackColorChanged(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Invalidate();Di2015NewLine            base.OnParentBackColorChanged(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9367328Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate long CreateUrlHash(string url)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    SHA1CryptoServiceProvider sha = new SHA1CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    byte[] encoded = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(url);Di2015NewLine    byte[] checksum = sha.ComputeHash(encoded);Di2015NewLine    return BitConverter.ToInt64(checksum, 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ...Di2015NewLinelong urlHash = CreateUrlHash(url);Di2015NewLineif (context.Links.Any(l => l.UrlHash == urlHash))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   continue;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9367616Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Regex _assemRegex = new Regex("(?<assembly>^.*?),.*");Di2015NewLineRegex reg = new Regex("(?<type>.*?), PublicKeyToken(=.*?)](?<end>.*)");Di2015NewLine//assume that all replacement types are in the same assembly with TypeReplacerDi2015NewLinestatic readonly string assembly2Use = System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().FullName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic override Type BindToType(string assemblyName, string typeName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // remove strong name from assemblyDi2015NewLine    Match match = _assemRegex.Match(assemblyName);Di2015NewLine    if (match.Success)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        assemblyName = match.Groups["assembly"].Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // remove strong name from any generic collections as many time as neededDi2015NewLine    match = reg.Match(typeName);Di2015NewLine    string typeWithoutSN = typeName;Di2015NewLine    while (match.Success)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        typeWithoutSN = string.Format("{0}]{1}",Di2015NewLine        match.Groups["type"].Value,Di2015NewLine        match.Groups["end"].Value);Di2015NewLine        match = reg.Match(typeWithoutSN);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // replace assembly name with the simple assemblyDi2015NewLine    // name - strip the strong nameDi2015NewLine    string type = string.Format("{0}, {1}", typeWithoutSN,Di2015NewLine    assemblyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The following line of code returns the type.Di2015NewLine    return Type.GetType(type);Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

9367937Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var a = (Bitmap)Image.FromFile("image1.png");Di2015NewLine    var b = (Bitmap)Image.FromFile("image2.png");Di2015NewLine    var diff = PixelDiff(a, b);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineunsafe Bitmap PixelDiff(Bitmap a, Bitmap b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Bitmap output = new Bitmap(a.Width, a.Height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine    Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(Point.Empty, a.Size);Di2015NewLine    using (var aData = a.LockBitsDisposable(rect, ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb))Di2015NewLine    using (var bData = b.LockBitsDisposable(rect, ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb))Di2015NewLine    using (var outputData = output.LockBitsDisposable(rect, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte* aPtr = (byte*)aData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine        byte* bPtr = (byte*)bData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine        byte* outputPtr = (byte*)outputData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine        int len = aData.Stride * aData.Height;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < len; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // For alpha use the average of both images (otherwise pixels with the same alpha won't be visible)Di2015NewLine            if ((i + 1) % 4 == 0)Di2015NewLine                *outputPtr = (byte)((*aPtr  + *bPtr) / 2);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                *outputPtr = (byte)~(*aPtr ^ *bPtr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            outputPtr++;Di2015NewLine            aPtr++;Di2015NewLine            bPtr++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return output;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static DisposableImageData LockBitsDisposable(this Bitmap bitmap, Rectangle rect, ImageLockMode flags, PixelFormat format)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new DisposableImageData(bitmap, rect, flags, format);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class DisposableImageData : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly Bitmap _bitmap;Di2015NewLine        private readonly BitmapData _data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal DisposableImageData(Bitmap bitmap, Rectangle rect, ImageLockMode flags, PixelFormat format)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bitmap.CheckArgumentNull("bitmap");Di2015NewLine            _bitmap = bitmap;Di2015NewLine            _data = bitmap.LockBits(rect, flags, format);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _bitmap.UnlockBits(_data);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IntPtr Scan0Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _data.Scan0; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int StrideDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _data.Stride;}Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int WidthDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _data.Width;}Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int HeightDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _data.Height;}Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public PixelFormat PixelFormatDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _data.PixelFormat;}Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int ReservedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _data.Reserved;}Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9371972Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public bool IsDirectory { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public List<Node> Children = new List<Node>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal void AddChildren(string f)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var dirs = Path.GetDirectoryName(f);Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(dirs))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // we are adding a fileDi2015NewLine            var file = Path.GetFileName(f);Di2015NewLine            Children.Add(new Node {Name = file, IsDirectory = false});Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // we are adding a directoryDi2015NewLine            var firstDir = dirs.Split(Path.DirectorySeparatorChar)[0];Di2015NewLine            var childNode = Children.FirstOrDefault(d => d.Name == firstDir);Di2015NewLine            if (childNode == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                childNode = new Node {Name = firstDir, IsDirectory = true};Di2015NewLine                Children.Add(childNode);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var subPath = f.Substring(firstDir.Length + 1);Di2015NewLine            childNode.AddChildren(subPath);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9378546Di2015UniqueSeparatorWrite
9378546Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool HasWritePermissionOnFile(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool writeAllow = false;Di2015NewLine    bool writeDeny = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    FileSecurity accessControlList = File.GetAccessControl(path);Di2015NewLine    if (accessControlList == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var accessRules = accessControlList.GetAccessRules(true, true, typeof(SecurityIdentifier));Di2015NewLine    if (accessRules == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (FileSystemAccessRule rule in accessRules)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((FileSystemRights.Write & rule.FileSystemRights) != FileSystemRights.Write)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (rule.AccessControlType == AccessControlType.Allow)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writeAllow = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (rule.AccessControlType == AccessControlType.Deny)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writeDeny = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return writeAllow && !writeDeny;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9381502Di2015UniqueSeparator(function ($) {Di2015NewLine    $.validator.unobtrusive.adapters.add('lessthanorequaldate', ['other'], function (options) {Di2015NewLine        var getModelPrefix = function (fieldName) {Di2015NewLine            return fieldName.substr(0, fieldName.lastIndexOf(".") + 1);Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var appendModelPrefix = function (value, prefix) {Di2015NewLine            if (value.indexOf("*.") === 0) {Di2015NewLine                value = value.replace("*.", prefix);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var prefix = getModelPrefix(options.element.name),Di2015NewLine            other = options.params.other,Di2015NewLine            fullOtherName = appendModelPrefix(other, prefix),Di2015NewLine            element = $(options.form).find(":input[name=" + fullOtherName + "]")[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        options.rules['lessthanorequaldate'] = element;Di2015NewLine        if (options.message != null) {Di2015NewLine            options.messages['lessthanorequaldate'] = options.message;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $.validator.addMethod('lessthanorequaldate', function (value, element, params) {Di2015NewLine        var parseDate = function (date) {Di2015NewLine            var m = date.match(/^(\\d{4})-(\\d{1,2})-(\\d{1,2})$/);Di2015NewLine            return m ? new Date(parseInt(m[1]), parseInt(m[2]) - 1, parseInt(m[3])) : null;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var date = parseDate(value);Di2015NewLine        var dateToCompareAgainst = parseDate($(params).val());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (isNaN(date.getTime()) || isNaN(dateToCompareAgainst.getTime())) {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return date <= dateToCompareAgainst;Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine})(jQuery);Di2015NewLine

9388706Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass WordSet {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public WordSet(IEnumerable<string> words) {Di2015NewLine        m_OriginalWords = new SortedSet<string>(words);Di2015NewLine        m_ReverseWords = new SortedSet<string>(words.Select(ReverseString));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Finds all words that start with given prefix.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<string> FindPrefix(string prefix) {Di2015NewLine        return FindImp(m_OriginalWords, prefix);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Finds all words that end with the given suffix.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<string> FindSuffix(string suffix) {Di2015NewLine        return FindImp(m_ReverseWords, ReverseString(suffix)).Select(ReverseString);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static IEnumerable<string> FindImp(SortedSet<string> word_set, string s) {Di2015NewLine        if (s.CompareTo(word_set.Max) <= 0) {Di2015NewLine            foreach (string word in word_set.GetViewBetween(s, word_set.Max)) {Di2015NewLine                if (!word.StartsWith(s))Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                yield return word;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static string ReverseString(string src) {Di2015NewLine        return new string(src.Reverse().ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    readonly SortedSet<string> m_OriginalWords;Di2015NewLine    readonly SortedSet<string> m_ReverseWords;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Program {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void TestImp(string s, IEnumerable<string> words) {Di2015NewLine        Console.Write(s);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var word in words) {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write('\\t');Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(word);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void TestPrefix(WordSet word_set, string prefix) {Di2015NewLine        TestImp(prefix, word_set.FindPrefix(prefix));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void TestSuffix(WordSet word_set, string suffix) {Di2015NewLine        TestImp(suffix, word_set.FindSuffix(suffix));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var word_set = new WordSet(Di2015NewLine            new[] {Di2015NewLine                "a",Di2015NewLine                "b",Di2015NewLine                "ba",Di2015NewLine                "baa",Di2015NewLine                "bab",Di2015NewLine                "bba",Di2015NewLine                "bbb",Di2015NewLine                "bbc",Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Prefixes:");Di2015NewLine        TestPrefix(word_set, "a");Di2015NewLine        TestPrefix(word_set, "b");Di2015NewLine        TestPrefix(word_set, "ba");Di2015NewLine        TestPrefix(word_set, "bb");Di2015NewLine        TestPrefix(word_set, "bc");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("\\nSuffixes:");Di2015NewLine        TestSuffix(word_set, "a");Di2015NewLine        TestSuffix(word_set, "b");Di2015NewLine        TestSuffix(word_set, "ba");Di2015NewLine        TestSuffix(word_set, "bb");Di2015NewLine        TestSuffix(word_set, "bc");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9388706Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrefixes:Di2015NewLinea       aDi2015NewLineb       b       ba      baa     bab     bba     bbb     bbcDi2015NewLineba      ba      baa     babDi2015NewLinebb      bba     bbb     bbcDi2015NewLinebcDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSuffixes:Di2015NewLinea       a       baa     ba      bbaDi2015NewLineb       b       bab     bbbDi2015NewLineba      ba      bbaDi2015NewLinebb      bbbDi2015NewLinebc      bbcDi2015NewLine

9400848Di2015UniqueSeparatorreader.Read()
9400848Di2015UniqueSeparatorreader
9400848Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void ReadXmlExt(XmlReader xmlReader, IXmlSerializableExt xmlSerializable, ReadElementDelegate readElementCallback)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool isEmpty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (xmlReader == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("xmlReader");Di2015NewLine    if (readElementCallback == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("readElementCallback");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Empty element?Di2015NewLine    isEmpty = xmlReader.IsEmptyElement;Di2015NewLine    // Decode attributesDi2015NewLine    if ((xmlReader.HasAttributes == true) && (xmlSerializable != null))Di2015NewLine        xmlSerializable.ReadAttributes(xmlReader);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Read the root start elementDi2015NewLine    xmlReader.ReadStartElement();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Decode elementsDi2015NewLine    if (isEmpty == false) {Di2015NewLine        do {Di2015NewLine            // Read document till next elementDi2015NewLine            xmlReader.MoveToContent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (xmlReader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element) {Di2015NewLine                string elementName = xmlReader.LocalName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Empty element?Di2015NewLine                isEmpty = xmlReader.IsEmptyElement;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Decode child elementDi2015NewLine                readElementCallback(xmlReader);Di2015NewLine                xmlReader.MoveToContent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Read the child end element (not empty)Di2015NewLine                if (isEmpty == false) {Di2015NewLine                    // Delegate check: it has to reach and end elementDi2015NewLine                    if (xmlReader.NodeType != XmlNodeType.EndElement)Di2015NewLine                        throw new InvalidOperationException(String.Format("not reached the end element"));Di2015NewLine                    // Delegate check: the end element shall correspond to the start element before delegateDi2015NewLine                    if (xmlReader.LocalName != elementName)Di2015NewLine                        throw new InvalidOperationException(String.Format("not reached the relative end element of {0}", elementName));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Child end elementDi2015NewLine                    xmlReader.ReadEndElement();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } else if (xmlReader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Text) {Di2015NewLine                if (xmlSerializable != null) {Di2015NewLine                    // InterfaceDi2015NewLine                    xmlSerializable.ReadText(xmlReader);Di2015NewLine                    Debug.Assert(xmlReader.NodeType != XmlNodeType.Text, "IXmlSerializableExt.ReadText shall read the text");Di2015NewLine                } elseDi2015NewLine                    xmlReader.Skip();   // Skip textDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } while (xmlReader.NodeType != XmlNodeType.EndElement);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9402561Di2015UniqueSeparator   public void Input(string Data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Output != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Prefix = ApplyReplaceRules(Prefix);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Postfix = ApplyReplaceRules(Postfix);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Output((int) OutputsEnum.OutputBeforeModified, Data);Di2015NewLine            Output((int) OutputsEnum.OutputModified, Prefix + Data + Postfix);Di2015NewLine            Output((int) OutputsEnum.OutputAfterModified, Data);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string ApplyReplaceRules(string patternString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(Postfix))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            patternString = patternString.Replace("{DS1}", DataStoreContents[0]);Di2015NewLine            patternString = patternString.Replace("{DS2}", DataStoreContents[1]);Di2015NewLine            patternString = patternString.Replace("{DS3}", DataStoreContents[2]);Di2015NewLine            patternString = patternString.Replace("{DS4}", DataStoreContents[3]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return patternString;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9402913Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string GetDecimal(BigInteger bigInteger, int divisor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    BigInteger remainder;Di2015NewLine    var quotient = BigInteger.DivRem(bigInteger, divisor, out remainder);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int decimalPlaces = 2;Di2015NewLine    var decimalPart = BigInteger.Zero;Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < decimalPlaces; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var div = (remainder*10)/divisor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        decimalPart *= 10;Di2015NewLine        decimalPart += div;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        remainder = remainder*10 - div*divisor;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var retValue = quotient.ToString() + "." + decimalPart.ToString(new string('0', decimalPlaces));Di2015NewLine    return retValue;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9406124Di2015UniqueSeparator     public Roll( int diceCount )Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine          // Do your random generation here for the number of diceDi2015NewLine         DiceResults = new int[0]; // your results.Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     public bool HasThreeOfAKind()Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         ResultCounts = new int[6]; // assuming 6 sided dieDi2015NewLine         foreach (var diceResult in DiceResults)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             // Increment and shortcut if the previous value was 2Di2015NewLine             if( (ResultCounts[diceResult]++) == 2) return true;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         return false;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine

9413711Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void Add<T>(this XmlAttributeOverrides overrides, Expression<Func<T, dynamic>> propertySelector, XmlAttributes attributes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        overrides.Add(typeof(T), propertySelector.BuildString(), attributes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string BuildString(this Expression propertySelector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (propertySelector.NodeType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Lambda:Di2015NewLine                LambdaExpression lambdaExpression = (LambdaExpression)propertySelector;Di2015NewLine                return BuildString(lambdaExpression.Body);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Convert:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Quote:Di2015NewLine                UnaryExpression unaryExpression = (UnaryExpression)propertySelector;Di2015NewLine                return BuildString(unaryExpression.Operand);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.MemberAccess:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                MemberExpression memberExpression = (MemberExpression)propertySelector;Di2015NewLine                MemberInfo propertyInfo = memberExpression.Member;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (memberExpression.Expression is ParameterExpression)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return propertyInfo.Name;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // we've got a nested property (e.g. MyType.SomeProperty.SomeNestedProperty)Di2015NewLine                    return BuildString(memberExpression.Expression) + "." + propertyInfo.Name;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                // drop out and throwDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException("Expression must be a member expression: " + propertySelector.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9414922Di2015UniqueSeparator static DateTime AddWithinWorkingHours(DateTime start, TimeSpan offset)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    const int hoursPerDay = 8;Di2015NewLine    const int startHour = 9;Di2015NewLine    // Don't start counting hours until start time is during working hoursDi2015NewLine    if (start.TimeOfDay.TotalHours > startHour + hoursPerDay)Di2015NewLine       start = start.Date.AddDays(1).AddHours(startHour);Di2015NewLine    if (start.TimeOfDay.TotalHours < startHour)Di2015NewLine       start = start.Date.AddHours(startHour);Di2015NewLine    if (start.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Saturday)Di2015NewLine       start.AddDays(2);Di2015NewLine    else if (start.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Sunday)Di2015NewLine       start.AddDays(1);Di2015NewLine    // Calculate how much working time already passed on the first dayDi2015NewLine    TimeSpan firstDayOffset = start.TimeOfDay.Subtract(TimeSpan.FromHours(startHour));Di2015NewLine    // Calculate number of whole days to addDi2015NewLine    int wholeDays = (int)(offset.Add(firstDayOffset).TotalHours / hoursPerDay);Di2015NewLine    // How many hours off the specified offset does this many whole days consume?Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan wholeDaysHours = TimeSpan.FromHours(wholeDays * hoursPerDay);Di2015NewLine    // Calculate the final time of day based on the number of whole days spanned and the specified offsetDi2015NewLine    TimeSpan remainder = offset - wholeDaysHours;Di2015NewLine    // How far into the week is the starting date?Di2015NewLine    int weekOffset = ((int)(start.DayOfWeek + 7) - (int)DayOfWeek.Monday) % 7;Di2015NewLine    // How many weekends are spanned?Di2015NewLine    int weekends = (int)((wholeDays + weekOffset) / 5);Di2015NewLine    // Calculate the final result using all the above calculated valuesDi2015NewLine    return start.AddDays(wholeDays + weekends * 2).Add(remainder);Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

9416568Di2015UniqueSeparatorNotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset
9416568Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BaseObservableCollection<T> : ObservableCollection<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Flag used to prevent OnCollectionChanged from firing during a bulk operation like Add(IEnumerable<T>) and Clear()Di2015NewLine    private bool _SuppressCollectionChanged = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// Overridden so that we may manually call registered handlers and differentiate between those that do and don't require Action.Reset args.Di2015NewLine    public override event NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler CollectionChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BaseObservableCollection() : base(){}Di2015NewLine    public BaseObservableCollection(IEnumerable<T> data) : base(data){}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Event HandlersDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnCollectionChanged(NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if( !_SuppressCollectionChanged )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            base.OnCollectionChanged(e);Di2015NewLine            if( CollectionChanged != null )Di2015NewLine                CollectionChanged.Invoke(this, e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //CollectionViews raise an error when they are passed a NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs that indicates more thanDi2015NewLine    //one element has been added or removed. They prefer to receive a "Action=Reset" notification, but this is not suitableDi2015NewLine    //for applications in code, so we actually check the type we're notifying on and pass a customized event args.Di2015NewLine    protected virtual void OnCollectionChangedMultiItem(NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler handlers = this.CollectionChanged;Di2015NewLine        if( handlers != null )Di2015NewLine            foreach( NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler handler in handlers.GetInvocationList() )Di2015NewLine                handler(this, !(handler.Target is ICollectionView) ? e : new NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs(NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Extended Collection MethodsDi2015NewLine    protected override void ClearItems()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if( this.Count == 0 ) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<T> removed = new List<T>(this);Di2015NewLine        _SuppressCollectionChanged = true;Di2015NewLine        base.ClearItems();Di2015NewLine        _SuppressCollectionChanged = false;Di2015NewLine        OnCollectionChangedMultiItem(new NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs(NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove, removed));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(IEnumerable<T> toAdd)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if( this == toAdd )Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Invalid operation. This would result in iterating over a collection as it is being modified.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _SuppressCollectionChanged = true;Di2015NewLine        foreach( T item in toAdd )Di2015NewLine            Add(item);Di2015NewLine        _SuppressCollectionChanged = false;Di2015NewLine        OnCollectionChangedMultiItem(new NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs(NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add, new List<T>(toAdd)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Remove(IEnumerable<T> toRemove)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if( this == toRemove )Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Invalid operation. This would result in iterating over a collection as it is being modified.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _SuppressCollectionChanged = true;Di2015NewLine        foreach( T item in toRemove )Di2015NewLine            Remove(item);Di2015NewLine        _SuppressCollectionChanged = false;Di2015NewLine        OnCollectionChangedMultiItem(new NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs(NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove, new List<T>(toRemove)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9420312Di2015UniqueSeparatorASP.NET controls require you to execute the DataBind method on the control to indicateDi2015NewLinethat the data is ready to be rendered. If you dont execute the DataBind method, the control wont render. When executing the DataBind method on a control, the control is obliged to call the DataBind method on its child controls.            Di2015NewLine        _result = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var worker = new Action(Run);Di2015NewLine        worker.BeginInvoke(delegate(IAsyncResult result) {Di2015NewLine            worker.EndInvoke(result);Di2015NewLine        }, null); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler Completed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void OnCompleted(EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        if (Completed != null)Di2015NewLine            Completed(this, e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void RaiseCompleted() {Di2015NewLine        OnCompleted(EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9425777Di2015UniqueSeparator    [AcceptVerbs(HttpVerbs.Post)]Di2015NewLine    public ActionResult ContactUs(DatabaseModelExtensions.ContactRequest model) // Pass          model of which I am submitting a form against to retrieve data inside this HTTPPost ControllerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create database object to map extension class to it.Di2015NewLine        ContactRequest NewEntry = new ContactRequest();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (ModelState.IsValid)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Map database object to the model passed and then insert.Di2015NewLine            NewEntry.Name = model.Name;Di2015NewLine            NewEntry.Email = model.Email;Di2015NewLine            NewEntry.Message = model.Message;Di2015NewLine            NewEntry.Timestamp = System.DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Insert new entry into database for historical trackingDi2015NewLine            NewEntry.Insert();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Clear modelstate (clearing form fields)Di2015NewLine            // ModelState.Clear(); -- Does not work with an Ajax call - requires postback.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Email user about their contact request and also send admins a summary of the contact request.Di2015NewLine            // Create new UserMailer Object so that we can invoke this class and work with it's functions/properties.Di2015NewLine            var Mailer = new UserMailer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Instantiated the 'msg' variable that will allow for us to invoke Mailer.ContactSubmission(), this function passes a series of parameters so that we can reference them insideDi2015NewLine            // our UserMailer.cs class which then gets passed to a mail template called ContactSubmission.cshtml under the Views -> UserMailer folderDi2015NewLine            var msg = Mailer.ContactSubmission(firstName: model.Name, email: model.Email, telephone: model.Telephone);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Same as above except we will be sending out the management notification.Di2015NewLine            var msg1 = Mailer.AdminContactSubmission(firstName: model.Name, email: model.Email, datetime: System.DateTime.Now, message: model.Message, telephone: model.Telephone);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Invoke the .Send() extended function that will actually execute everything to send an SMTP mail Request.Di2015NewLine            msg1.Send();Di2015NewLine            msg.Send();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Return our content back to the page asynchronously also create a quick snippet of js to slide the message up after a few seconds.               Di2015NewLine            return Content(new MvcHtmlString(@"Di2015NewLine                                    <div id='sendmessage'>Di2015NewLine                                        Your message has been sent, Thank you!Di2015NewLine                                    </div>Di2015NewLine                                    <script type='text/javascript'>Di2015NewLine                                       setTimeout(function () { jQuery('#results').slideUp('fast') }, 3000);Di2015NewLine                                    </script>").ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine            // Return our Error back to the page asynchronously.Di2015NewLine        return Content(new MvcHtmlString(@"Di2015NewLine                                    <div id='errormessage'>Di2015NewLine                                        An error has occured, please try again in a few moments!Di2015NewLine                                    </div>Di2015NewLine                                    <script type='text/javascript'>Di2015NewLine                                       setTimeout(function () { jQuery('#results').slideUp('fast') }, 3000);Di2015NewLine                                    </script>").ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9430032Di2015UniqueSeparator    delegate bool DateEvaluator(DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate, DateTime dateToCheck, int periodicity);Di2015NewLine
9430032Di2015UniqueSeparatordayPeriodicityChecker
9430032Di2015UniqueSeparatorweekPeriodicityChecker
9430032Di2015UniqueSeparatormonthPeriodicityChecker
9430032Di2015UniqueSeparatordayPeriodicityChecker
9430032Di2015UniqueSeparator        DateEvaluator dayPeriodicityChecker = (startDate, endDate, dateToCheck, periodicity) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if ((dateToCheck < startDate) || (dateToCheck > endDate))Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                TimeSpan dateDiff = dateToCheck - startDate;Di2015NewLine                return dateDiff.Days % periodicity == 0;Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine
9430032Di2015UniqueSeparatorweekPeriodicityChecker
9430032Di2015UniqueSeparator        DateEvaluator weekPeriodicityChecker = (startDate, endDate, dateToCheck, periodicity) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if ((dateToCheck < startDate) || (dateToCheck > endDate))Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                DateTime adjustedStartDate = startDate.AddDays(-(int)startDate.DayOfWeek + 1);Di2015NewLine                TimeSpan dateDiff = dateToCheck - adjustedStartDate;Di2015NewLine                return (dateDiff.Days / 7) % periodicity == 0;Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine
9430032Di2015UniqueSeparatormonthPeriodicityChecker
9430032Di2015UniqueSeparator        DateEvaluator monthPeriodicityChecker dateToCheck, periodicity) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if ((dateToCheck < startDate) || (dateToCheck > endDate))Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int monthDiff = 0; Di2015NewLine                while (startDate.AddMonths(1) < dateToCheck)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    monthDiff++Di2015NewLine                    // i'm sure there is a speedier way to calculate the month difference, but this should do for the purpose of this example Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return (monthDiff - 1) % periodicity == 0;Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine
9430032Di2015UniqueSeparator        DateEvaluator[] dateEvaluators = new DateEvaluator[] Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dayPeriodicityChecker,Di2015NewLine            weekPeriodicityChecker,Di2015NewLine            monthPeriodicityCheckerDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine
9430032Di2015UniqueSeparatorint periodicityType = 0; // or 1=week or 2=monthsDi2015NewLinebool isDateIn = dateEvaluators[periodicityType ](startDate, endDate, dateTocheck, Periodicity)Di2015NewLine
9430032Di2015UniqueSeparator        PeriodicityEvent pEvent = new PeriodicityEventDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Name = "record1",Di2015NewLine            DateStart = new DateTime(2012, 02, 02),Di2015NewLine            DateEnd = new DateTime(2012, 03, 31),Di2015NewLine            PeriodicityType = 1,Di2015NewLine            Periodicity = 2Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DateTime baseDate = new DateTime(2012, 02, 01);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 30; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine            DateTime testDate = baseDate.AddDays(i);Di2015NewLine            if (dateEvaluators[pEvent.PeriodicityType](pEvent.DateStart, pEvent.DateEnd, testDate, pEvent.Periodicity))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("{0} is in", testDate.ToString("dd MMM"));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("{0} is out", testDate.ToString("dd MMM"));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine

9436287Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class BusinessCycle {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double rate = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // an enum that can make traversing the BusinessCycle structure easier.Di2015NewLine    BusinessCycleType whatAmI;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double AcutalRate {get; set;}Di2015NewLine    public double TargetedRate {get; set;}Di2015NewLine    public double ComputedRate {Di2015NewLine        get { return CalculateRate(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // a week has a List of days, a month a list of weeks ...Di2015NewLine    protected List<BusinessCycle> businessCycleLentgh = new List<BusinessCycle>;   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected double CalculateRate() {Di2015NewLine        if (businessCycleLength == null) return rate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        rate = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (BusinessCycle cycleLength in businessCycleLength) {Di2015NewLine            rate += cycleLength.CalculateRate();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return rate;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} // BusinessCycle classDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class BusinessDay : BusinessCycle {Di2015NewLine    public BusinessDay() {Di2015NewLine        this.businessCycleLength.Add(this);     // so we don't need a special CalcuateRate() - a BusinessDay has no "sub components"Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class BusinessWeek : BusinessCycle {}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class BusinessMonth : BusinessCycle {}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic enum BusinessCycleType {Di2015NewLine    Day, Week, Month, Quarter, YearDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
