9436960Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Gets the list of routed event handlers subscribed to the specified routed event.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="element">The UI element on which the event is defined.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="routedEvent">The routed event for which to retrieve the event handlers.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>The list of subscribed routed event handlers.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static RoutedEventHandlerInfo[] GetRoutedEventHandlers(UIElement element, RoutedEvent routedEvent)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get the EventHandlersStore instance which holds event handlers for the specified element.Di2015NewLine    // The EventHandlersStore class is declared as internal.Di2015NewLine    var eventHandlersStoreProperty = typeof(UIElement).GetProperty(Di2015NewLine        "EventHandlersStore", BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLine    object eventHandlersStore = eventHandlersStoreProperty.GetValue(element, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Invoke the GetRoutedEventHandlers method on the EventHandlersStore instance Di2015NewLine    // for getting an array of the subscribed event handlers.Di2015NewLine    var getRoutedEventHandlers = eventHandlersStore.GetType().GetMethod(Di2015NewLine        "GetRoutedEventHandlers", BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLine    var routedEventHandlers = (RoutedEventHandlerInfo[])getRoutedEventHandlers.Invoke(Di2015NewLine        eventHandlersStore, new object[] { routedEvent });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return routedEventHandlers;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9437502Di2015UniqueSeparatorFile.WriteAllLines
9437502Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch stopwatch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        var lines = from line in File.ReadLines("input.txt")Di2015NewLine                    let cpf = ParseCpf(line)Di2015NewLine                    let xml = ParseXml(line)Di2015NewLine                    from year in ParseYears(line)Di2015NewLine                    select cpf + year + xml;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        File.WriteAllLines("output.txt", lines);Di2015NewLine        stopwatch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Completed in {0}ms", stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Returns the CPF, in the form "CPF=xxxxxx;"Di2015NewLine    static string ParseCpf(string line)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int start = line.IndexOf("CPF=");Di2015NewLine        int end = line.IndexOf(";", start);Di2015NewLine        // TODO: ValidationDi2015NewLine        return line.Substring(start, end + 1 - start);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Returns a sequence of year values, in the form "YEAR=2010;"Di2015NewLine    static IEnumerable<string> ParseYears(string line)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // First year.Di2015NewLine        int start = line.IndexOf("YEARS=") + 6;Di2015NewLine        int end = line.IndexOf(" ", start);Di2015NewLine        // TODO: ValidationDi2015NewLine        string years = line.Substring(start, end - start);Di2015NewLine        foreach (string year in years.Split(';'))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return "YEARS=" + year + ";";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Returns all the XML from the leading space onwardsDi2015NewLine    static string ParseXml(string line)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int start = line.IndexOf(" <?xml");Di2015NewLine        // TODO: ValidationDi2015NewLine        return line.Substring(start);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9441633Di2015UniqueSeparator   class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static object _ActiveWorkersLock = new object();Di2015NewLine        static int _CountOfActiveWorkers;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Go(object state)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Hello");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (_ActiveWorkersLock)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    --_CountOfActiveWorkers;Di2015NewLine                    Monitor.PulseAll(_ActiveWorkersLock);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (_ActiveWorkersLock)Di2015NewLine                    ++_CountOfActiveWorkers;Di2015NewLine                ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(Go);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock (_ActiveWorkersLock)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (_CountOfActiveWorkers > 0)Di2015NewLine                    Monitor.Wait(_ActiveWorkersLock);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("All done");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9442009Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar results = Regex.Split(number, @"(0|1)")Di2015NewLine                   .Where(p => !String.IsNullOrEmpty(p));Di2015NewLine
9442009Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<string> results = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineint curInd = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar matchInfo = Regex.Matches(number, "(0|1)");Di2015NewLineforeach (Match m in matchInfo)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Currently at the start of a match, add the match sequence to the result list.Di2015NewLine    if (curInd == m.Index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        results.Add(number.Substring(m.Index, m.Length));Di2015NewLine        curInd += m.Length;  Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else  //add the substring up to the match point and then add the match itselfDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        results.Add(number.Substring(curInd, m.Index - curInd));Di2015NewLine        results.Add(number.Substring(m.Index, m.Length));Di2015NewLine        curInd = m.Index + m.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine//add any remaining text after the last matchDi2015NewLineif (curInd < number.Length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    results.Add(number.Substring(curInd));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9444658Di2015UniqueSeparator//store all the values that will not change through the execution for faster accessDi2015NewLine var productNameInfoRows = dsProductNameInfo.Tables[0].Rows;Di2015NewLine var fullRows = dsFull.Tables[0].Rows;Di2015NewLine var productInfoCount = productNameInfoRows.Count;Di2015NewLine var fullCount = fullRows.Count;Di2015NewLine var full = new List<int[]>(fullCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine for (int i = 0; i < productInfoCount; i++){Di2015NewLine     //we're going to compare has codes and not stringsDi2015NewLine     var prd = productNameInfoRows[i][0].ToString().Split(';')Di2015NewLine               .Select(s => s.GetHashCode()).OrderBy(t=>t).ToArray();Di2015NewLine     for (int k = 0; k < fullCount; k++){Di2015NewLine         //caches the calculation for all subsequent oterations of the outer loopDi2015NewLine         if (i == 0) {Di2015NewLine             full.Add(fullRows[k][0].ToString().Split(';')Di2015NewLine                      .Select(s => s.GetHashCode()).OrderBy(t=>t).ToArray());Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         var fl = full[k];Di2015NewLine         var count = 0;Di2015NewLine         for(var j = 0;j<fl.Length;j++){Di2015NewLine             var f = fl[j];Di2015NewLine             //the values are sorted so we can exit earlyDi2015NewLine             for(var m = 0;m<prd.Length && prd[m] <= f;m++){Di2015NewLine                 count += prd[m] == f ? 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         if((double)(fl.Length + prd.Length)/count >= 0.6){Di2015NewLine             //there's a matchDi2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

productNameInfoRows[i][0].ToString().Split(';')Di2015NewLine                          .Select(p => p.GetHashCode())){Di2015NewLine        if (!lists.ContainsKey(token)){Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Count all matches for each pair of rowsDi2015NewLinevar counts = new Dictionary<int, Dictionary<int, int>>();Di2015NewLineforeach(var key in lists.Keys){Di2015NewLine    foreach(var p in lists[key].Item1){Di2015NewLine        if(!counts.ContainsKey(p)){Di2015NewLine            counts.Add(p,new Dictionary<int, int>());Di2015NewLine 9448095Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool DeleteTiffTags(string sFileName, List<ushort> ushortTagNumbers)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Deletes a list of tiff tag from the given imageDi2015NewLine    //Returns true if successful or false if error occuredDi2015NewLine     //Define variablesDi2015NewLine    List<TIFFTAGS_PAGE> ttPage = new List<TIFFTAGS_PAGE>();Di2015NewLine     //Check for empty listDi2015NewLine    if (ushortTagNumbers.Count == 0) return false;Di2015NewLine     tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //ADDEDDi2015NewLine        m_lTagsToWrite = new List<TIFFTAGS_TAG>();Di2015NewLine        m_lTagsToWrite.Add(new TIFFTAGS_TAG("", 38001, Convert.ToString("")));Di2015NewLine        m_lTagsToWrite.Add(new TIFFTAGS_TAG("", 38002, Convert.ToString("")));Di2015NewLine        m_parentExtender = Tiff.SetTagExtender(TagExtender);Di2015NewLine         //Open the file for readingDi2015NewLine        using (Tiff input = Tiff.Open(sFileName, "r"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (input == null) return false;Di2015NewLine             //Get page countDi2015NewLine            int numberOfDirectories = input.NumberOfDirectories();Di2015NewLine             //Go through all the pagesDi2015NewLine            for (short i = 0; i < numberOfDirectories; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Set the pageDi2015NewLine                input.SetDirectory(i);Di2015NewLine                 //Create a new tags dictionary to store all my tagsDi2015NewLine                Dictionary<ushort, FieldValue[]> dTags = new Dictionary<ushort, FieldValue[]>();Di2015NewLine                 //Get all the tags for the pageDi2015NewLine                for (ushort t = ushort.MinValue; t < ushort.MaxValue; ++t)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    TiffTag tag = (TiffTag)t;Di2015NewLine                    FieldValue[] tagValue = input.GetField(tag);Di2015NewLine                    if (tagValue != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        dTags.Add(t, tagValue);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                 //Check if the page is encodedDi2015NewLine                bool encoded = false;Di2015NewLine                FieldValue[] compressionTagValue = input.GetField(TiffTag.COMPRESSION);Di2015NewLine                if (compressionTagValue != null)Di2015NewLine                    encoded = (compressionTagValue[0].ToInt() != (int)Compression.NONE);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Create a new byte array to store all my image dataDi2015NewLine                int numberOfStrips = input.NumberOfStrips();Di2015NewLine                byte[] byteImageData = new byte[numberOfStrips * input.StripSize()];Di2015NewLine                int offset = 0;Di2015NewLine                 //Get all the image data for the pageDi2015NewLine                for (int n = 0; n < numberOfStrips; ++n)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int bytesRead;Di2015NewLine                    if (encoded)Di2015NewLine                        bytesRead = input.ReadEncodedStrip(n, byteImageData, offset, byteImageData.Length - offset);Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        bytesRead = input.ReadRawStrip(n, byteImageData, offset, byteImageData.Length - offset);Di2015NewLine                     //Add to the offset keeping up with where we areDi2015NewLine                    offset += bytesRead;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                 //Save all the tags, image data, and height, etc for the pageDi2015NewLine                TIFFTAGS_PAGE tiffPage = new TIFFTAGS_PAGE();Di2015NewLine                tiffPage.Height = input.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();Di2015NewLine                tiffPage.Tags = dTags;Di2015NewLine                tiffPage.PageData = byteImageData;Di2015NewLine                tiffPage.Encoded = encoded;Di2015NewLine                tiffPage.StripSize = input.StripSize();Di2015NewLine                tiffPage.StripOffset = input.GetField(TiffTag.STRIPOFFSETS)[0].ToIntArray()[0];Di2015NewLine                ttPage.Add(tiffPage);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine         //Open the file for writingDi2015NewLine        using (Tiff output = Tiff.Open(sFileName + "-new.tif", "w"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (output == null) return false;Di2015NewLine             //Go through all the pagesDi2015NewLine            for (short i = 0; i < ttPage.Count(); ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Write all the tags for the pageDi2015NewLine                foreach (KeyValuePair<ushort, FieldValue[]> tagValue in ttPage[i].Tags)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Write all the tags except the one's needing to be deletedDi2015NewLine                    if (!ushortTagNumbers.Contains(tagValue.Key))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        TiffTag tag = (TiffTag)tagValue.Key;Di2015NewLine                        output.GetTagMethods().SetField(output, tag, tagValue.Value);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                 //Set the height for the pageDi2015NewLine                output.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, ttPage[i].Height);Di2015NewLine                 //Set the offset for the pageDi2015NewLine                output.SetField(TiffTag.STRIPOFFSETS, ttPage[i].StripOffset);Di2015NewLine                 //Save page data along with tagsDi2015NewLine                output.CheckpointDirectory();Di2015NewLine                 //Write each strip one at a time using the same orginal strip sizeDi2015NewLine                int numberOfStrips = ttPage[i].PageData.Length / ttPage[i].StripSize;Di2015NewLine                int offset = 0;Di2015NewLine                for (int n = 0; n < numberOfStrips; ++n)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Write all the image data (strips) for the pageDi2015NewLine                    if (ttPage[i].Encoded)Di2015NewLine                        //output.WriteEncodedStrip(n, byteStrip, offset, byteStrip.Length - offset);Di2015NewLine                        output.WriteEncodedStrip(0, ttPage[i].PageData, offset, ttPage[i].StripSize - offset);Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        output.WriteRawStrip(n, ttPage[i].PageData, offset, ttPage[i].StripSize - offset);Di2015NewLine                     //Add to the offset keeping up with where we areDi2015NewLine                    offset += ttPage[i].StripOffset;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                 //Save the image pageDi2015NewLine                output.WriteDirectory();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine         //ADDEDDi2015NewLine        Tiff.SetTagExtender(m_parentExtender);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //ADDEDDi2015NewLine        Tiff.SetTagExtender(m_parentExtender);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Error occuredDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine     //Return successDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9452472Di2015UniqueSeparator[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic void CanSearchBranchesContainingASpecificCommit()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var repo = new Repository(StandardTestRepoPath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const string commitSha = "5b5b025afb0b4c913b4c338a42934a3863bf3644";Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<Branch> branches = ListBranchesContaininingCommit(repo, commitSha);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        branches.Count().ShouldEqual(6);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate IEnumerable<Branch> ListBranchesContaininingCommit(Repository repo, string commitSha)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var branch in repo.Branches)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var commits = repo.Commits.QueryBy(new Filter { Since = branch }).Where(c => c.Sha == commitSha);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (commits.Count() == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        yield return branch;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9452472Di2015UniqueSeparator[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic void CanSearchBranchesContainingASpecificCommit()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var repo = new Repository(StandardTestRepoPath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const string commitSha = "5b5b025afb0b4c913b4c338a42934a3863bf3644";Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<Branch> branches = ListBranchesContaininingCommit(repo, commitSha);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        branches.Count().ShouldEqual(6);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const string otherCommitSha = "4a202b346bb0fb0db7eff3cffeb3c70babbd2045";Di2015NewLine        branches = ListBranchesContaininingCommit(repo, otherCommitSha);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        branches.Count().ShouldEqual(1); // origin/packed-testDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate IEnumerable<Branch> ListBranchesContaininingCommit(Repository repo, string commitSha)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool directBranchHasBeenFound = false;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var branch in repo.Branches)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (branch.Tip.Sha != commitSha)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        directBranchHasBeenFound = true;Di2015NewLine        yield return branch;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (directBranchHasBeenFound)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var branch in repo.Branches)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var commits = repo.Commits.QueryBy(new Filter { Since = branch }).Where(c => c.Sha == commitSha);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (commits.Count() == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        yield return branch;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9453686Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void Next(object commandArg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IRegion myRegion = _regionManager.Regions["TopLeftRegion"];Di2015NewLine        object activeView = myRegion.ActiveViews.FirstOrDefault();  //Here we're trusting that nobody changed the region to support more than one active viewDi2015NewLine        List<object> myList = myRegion.Views.ToList<object>();      //Cast the list of views into a List<object> so we can access views by indexDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int currentIndex =  myList.FindIndex(theView => theView == activeView);Di2015NewLine        int nextIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % (myList.Count);        //Wrap back to the first view if we're at the last viewDi2015NewLine        object nextView = myList[nextIndex];Di2015NewLine        myRegion.Activate(nextView);  Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9455784Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<string> GetTraversal(Node root) {Di2015NewLine  var list = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine  foreach (var child in root.Children()) {Di2015NewLine    GetTraversal(child, "", list);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void GetTraversal(Node node, string path, List<string> list) {Di2015NewLine  path = path == "" ? node.Data : path + " " + node.Data;Di2015NewLine  if (node.Children.Count == 0) {Di2015NewLine    list.Add(path);Di2015NewLine  } else {Di2015NewLine    foreach(var child in node.Children) {Di2015NewLine      GetTraversal(child, path, list);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9455806Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass BitReaderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int _bit;Di2015NewLine    byte _currentByte;Di2015NewLine    Stream _stream;Di2015NewLine    public BitReader(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    { _stream = stream; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool? ReadBit(bool bigEndian = false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (_bit == 8 ) Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var r = _stream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine        if (r== -1) return null;Di2015NewLine        _bit = 0; Di2015NewLine        _curentByte  = (byte)r;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      bool value;Di2015NewLine      if (!bigEndian)Di2015NewLine         value = (_curentByte & (1 << _bit)) > 0;Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine         value = (_curentByte & (1 << (7-_bit))) > 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      _bit++;Di2015NewLine      return value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

set; }Di2015NewLine        public List<Task> Tasks { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Class to act as a global contextDi2015NewLine    public class WizardSchemaProviderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Global variable to keep state of all steps (which contani all tasks)Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public List<Step> Steps { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Current step, determined by URL or some other meansDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public Step CurrentStep { get { return null; /* add some logic to determine current step from URL */ } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Default Constructor; can get data here to populate Steps propertyDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public WizardSchemaProvider()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Init; get your data from DBDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Utility method - returns all tasks that match visibility dependency for the current page;Di2015NewLine        /// Designed to be called from a navigation control;Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="step"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        private IEnumerable<Task> GetAllTasksToDisplay(Step step)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Let's break down the visibility dependency for each one by encapsulating into a delegate;Di2015NewLine            Func<VisibilityDependency, bool> isVisibilityDependencyMet = v =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Get the step in the visibility dependencyDi2015NewLine                var stepToCheck = Steps.First(s => s.StepID == v.StepID);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (null == v.TaskID)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // If the task is null, we want all tasks for the step to be completedDi2015NewLine                    return stepToCheckDi2015NewLine                        .Tasks // Look at the List<Task> for the step in questionDi2015NewLine                        .All(t => t.IsComplete); // make sure all steps are completeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // if the above is all true, then the current task being checked can be displayedDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If the task ID is not null, we only want the specific task (not the whole step)Di2015NewLine                return stepToCheckDi2015NewLine                    .TasksDi2015NewLine                    .First(t => t.TaskID == v.TaskID) // get the task to checkDi2015NewLine                    .IsComplete;Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // This Func just runs throgh the list of dependencies for each task to return whether they are met or not; all must be metDi2015NewLine            var tasksThatCanBeVisible = stepDi2015NewLine                .TasksDi2015NewLine                .Where(t => t.VisibilityDependencyListDi2015NewLine                    .All(v => isVisibilityDependencyMet(v)Di2015NewLine                ));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return tasksThatCanBeVisible;    Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public List<string> GetControlIDListForTasksToDisplay(Step step)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.GetAllTasksToDisplay(this.CurrentStep).Select(t => t.TaskControlID).ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9461311Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static R WithTimeout<R>(Func<R> proc, int duration)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var wh = proc.BeginInvoke(null, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (wh.AsyncWaitHandle.WaitOne(duration))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return proc.EndInvoke(wh);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  throw new TimeOutException();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9461311Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar r = WithTimeout(() => regex.Match(foo), 1000);Di2015NewLine
9461311Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static R WithTimeout<R>(Func<R> proc, int duration)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var reset = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine  var r = default(R);Di2015NewLine  Exception ex = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var t = new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      r = proc();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      ex = e;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    reset.Set();Di2015NewLine  });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  t.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // not sure if this is really needed in generalDi2015NewLine  while (t.ThreadState != ThreadState.Running)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Thread.Sleep(0);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (!reset.WaitOne(duration))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    t.Abort();Di2015NewLine    throw new TimeoutException();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (ex != null)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    throw ex;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return r;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9464497Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string WriteVisualTree(DependencyObject parent)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (parent == null)Di2015NewLine        return "No Visual Tree Available. DependencyObject is null.";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var stringWriter = new StringWriter())Di2015NewLine    using (var indentedTextWriter = new IndentedTextWriter(stringWriter, "  "))Di2015NewLine    {               Di2015NewLine        WriteVisualTreeRecursive(indentedTextWriter, parent, 0);Di2015NewLine        return stringWriter.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void WriteVisualTreeRecursive(IndentedTextWriter writer, DependencyObject parent, int indentLevel)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (parent == null)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int childCount = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(parent);Di2015NewLine    string typeName = parent.GetType().Name;Di2015NewLine    string objName = parent.GetValue(FrameworkElement.NameProperty) as string;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    writer.Indent = indentLevel;Di2015NewLine    writer.WriteLine(String.Format("[{0:000}] {1} ({2}) {3}", indentLevel, Di2015NewLine                                                              String.IsNullOrEmpty(objName) ? typeName : objName, Di2015NewLine                                                              typeName, childCount)Di2015NewLine                    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int childIndex = 0; childIndex < childCount; ++childIndex)Di2015NewLine        WriteVisualTreeRecursive(writer, VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(parent, childIndex), indentLevel + 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string WriteLogicalTree(DependencyObject parent)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (parent == null)Di2015NewLine        return "No Logical Tree Available. DependencyObject is null.";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var stringWriter = new StringWriter())Di2015NewLine    using (var indentedTextWriter = new IndentedTextWriter(stringWriter, "  "))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        WriteLogicalTreeRecursive(indentedTextWriter, parent, 0);Di2015NewLine        return stringWriter.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void WriteLogicalTreeRecursive(IndentedTextWriter writer, DependencyObject parent, int indentLevel)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (parent == null)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var children = LogicalTreeHelper.GetChildren(parent).OfType<DependencyObject>();Di2015NewLine    int childCount = children.Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string typeName = parent.GetType().Name;Di2015NewLine    string objName = parent.GetValue(FrameworkElement.NameProperty) as string;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double actualWidth = (parent.GetValue(FrameworkElement.ActualWidthProperty) as double?).GetValueOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    double actualHeight = (parent.GetValue(FrameworkElement.ActualHeightProperty) as double?).GetValueOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    writer.Indent = indentLevel;Di2015NewLine    writer.WriteLine(String.Format("[{0:000}] {1} ({2}) {3}", indentLevel,Di2015NewLine                                                              String.IsNullOrEmpty(objName) ? typeName : objName,Di2015NewLine                                                              typeName, Di2015NewLine                                                              childCount)Di2015NewLine                    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (object child in LogicalTreeHelper.GetChildren(parent))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (child is DependencyObject)Di2015NewLine            WriteLogicalTreeRecursive(writer, (DependencyObject)child, indentLevel + 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9468016Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IsValidDate(int year, int month, int day)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (year < DateTime.MinValue.Year || year > DateTime.MaxValue.Year)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (month < 1 || month > 12)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return day > 0 && day <= DateTime.DaysInMonth(year, month);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9468016Di2015UniqueSeparatorDateTime
9468016Di2015UniqueSeparatorDateTime
9468016Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DateTime? TryNew(int year,Di2015NewLine                               int month,Di2015NewLine                               int day,Di2015NewLine                               Calendar calendar)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (calendar == null)Di2015NewLine        calendar = new GregorianCalendar();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (year < calendar.MinSupportedDateTime.Year)Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (year > calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime.Year)Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Note that even with this check we can't assert this is a validDi2015NewLine    // month because one year may be "shared" for two eras moreover hereDi2015NewLine    // we're assuming current era.Di2015NewLine    if (month < 1 || month > calendar.GetMonthsInYear(year))Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (day <= 0 || day > DateTime.DaysInMonth(year, month))Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Now, probably, date is valid but there may still be issuesDi2015NewLine    // about era and missing days because of calendar changes.Di2015NewLine    // For all this checks we rely on DateTime implementation.        Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new DateTime(year, month, day, calendar);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (ArgumentOutOfRangeException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9468016Di2015UniqueSeparatorreturn TryNew(year, month, day) ?? DateTime.MinValue;Di2015NewLine

9469744Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DownloadDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void SmallFile(string filename, string filepath, string contentType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FileStream MyFileStream = new FileStream(filepath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.Read);Di2015NewLine            long FileSize;Di2015NewLine            FileSize = MyFileStream.Length;Di2015NewLine            byte[] Buffer = new byte[(int)FileSize];Di2015NewLine            MyFileStream.Read(Buffer, 0, (int)MyFileStream.Length);Di2015NewLine            MyFileStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.ContentType = contentType;Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.AddHeader("Content-Disposition", "attachment;filename=" + HttpUtility.UrlEncode(filename, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8));Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.BinaryWrite(Buffer);             Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.ContentType = "text/html";Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("Downloading Error!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        HttpContext.Current.Response.End();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void LargeFile(string filename, string filepath, string contentType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stream iStream = null;Di2015NewLine        // Buffer to read 10K bytes in chunkDi2015NewLine        //byte[] buffer = new Byte[10000];Di2015NewLine        // Buffer to read 1024K bytes in chunkDi2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new Byte[1048576];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Length of the file:Di2015NewLine        int length;Di2015NewLine        // Total bytes to read:Di2015NewLine        long dataToRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Open the file. Di2015NewLine            iStream = new FileStream(filepath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.Read);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Total bytes to read:Di2015NewLine            dataToRead = iStream.Length;Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.ContentType = contentType;Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.AddHeader("Content-Disposition", "attachment; filename=" + HttpUtility.UrlEncode(filename, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Read the bytes.Di2015NewLine            while (dataToRead > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Verify that the client is connected.Di2015NewLine                if (HttpContext.Current.Response.IsClientConnected)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Read the data in buffer.Di2015NewLine                    length = iStream.Read(buffer, 0, 10000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Write the data to the current output stream.Di2015NewLine                    HttpContext.Current.Response.OutputStream.Write(buffer, 0, length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Flush the data to the HTML output.Di2015NewLine                    HttpContext.Current.Response.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    buffer = new Byte[10000];Di2015NewLine                    dataToRead = dataToRead - length;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //prevent infinite loop if user disconnectsDi2015NewLine                    dataToRead = -1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Trap the error, if any.Di2015NewLine            //HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("Error : " + ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.ContentType = "text/html";Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("Error : file not found");                 Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (iStream != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Close the file.Di2015NewLine                iStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.End();Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.Close();             Di2015NewLine        }         Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ResumableFile(string filename, string fullpath, string contentType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FileStream myFile = new FileStream(fullpath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.ReadWrite);Di2015NewLine            BinaryReader br = new BinaryReader(myFile);Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                HttpContext.Current.Response.AddHeader("Accept-Ranges", "bytes");Di2015NewLine                HttpContext.Current.Response.Buffer = false;Di2015NewLine                long fileLength = myFile.Length;Di2015NewLine                long startBytes = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //int pack = 10240; //10K bytesDi2015NewLine                int pack = 1048576; //1024K bytesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (HttpContext.Current.Request.Headers["Range"] != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    HttpContext.Current.Response.StatusCode = 206;Di2015NewLine                    string[] range = HttpContext.Current.Request.Headers["Range"].Split(new char[] { '=', '-' });Di2015NewLine                    startBytes = Convert.ToInt64(range[1]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                HttpContext.Current.Response.AddHeader("Content-Length", (fileLength - startBytes).ToString());Di2015NewLine                if (startBytes != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    HttpContext.Current.Response.AddHeader("Content-Range", string.Format(" bytes {0}-{1}/{2}", startBytes, fileLength - 1, fileLength));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                HttpContext.Current.Response.AddHeader("Connection", "Keep-Alive");Di2015NewLine                HttpContext.Current.Response.ContentType = contentType;Di2015NewLine                HttpContext.Current.Response.AddHeader("Content-Disposition", "attachment;filename=" + HttpUtility.UrlEncode(filename, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                br.BaseStream.Seek(startBytes, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine                int maxCount = (int)Math.Floor((double)((fileLength - startBytes) / pack)) + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < maxCount; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (HttpContext.Current.Response.IsClientConnected)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        HttpContext.Current.Response.BinaryWrite(br.ReadBytes(pack));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        i = maxCount;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                HttpContext.Current.Response.ContentType = "text/html";Di2015NewLine                HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("Error : file not found");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                br.Close();Di2015NewLine                myFile.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.ContentType = "text/html";Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("Error : file not found");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }     Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9478394Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing Excel = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel;Di2015NewLine public static bool ExportDataTableToExcel(DataTable dt, string filepath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Excel.Application oXL;Di2015NewLine    Excel.Workbook oWB;Di2015NewLine    Excel.Worksheet oSheet;Di2015NewLine    Excel.Range oRange;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Start Excel and get Application object. Di2015NewLine        oWB = oXL.Workbooks.Add(Missing.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the Active sheet Di2015NewLine        oSheet = (Excel.Worksheet)oWB.ActiveSheet;Di2015NewLine        oSheet.Name = "Data";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int rowCount = 1;Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataRow dr in dt.Rows)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rowCount += 1;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; 9479432Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void LockUnlockBitsExample(PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a new bitmap.Di2015NewLine    Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap("c:\\\\fakePhoto.jpg");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Lock the bitmap's bits.  Di2015NewLine    Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height);Di2015NewLine    System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData bmpData = Di2015NewLine        bmp.LockBits(rect, System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode.ReadWrite,Di2015NewLine        bmp.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the address of the first line.Di2015NewLine           IntPtr ptr = bmpData.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Declare an array to hold the bytes of the bitmap.Di2015NewLine    // This code is specific to a bitmap with 24 bits per pixels.Di2015NewLine    int bytes = bmp.Width * bmp.Height * 3;Di2015NewLine    byte[] rgbValues = new byte[bytes];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Copy the RGB values into the array.Di2015NewLine    System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(ptr, rgbValues, 0, bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set every red value to 255.  Di2015NewLine    for (int counter = 2; counter < rgbValues.Length; counter+=3)Di2015NewLine        rgbValues[counter] = 255;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Copy the RGB values back to the bitmapDi2015NewLine    System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(rgbValues, 0, ptr, bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Unlock the bits.Di2015NewLine    bmp.UnlockBits(bmpData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Draw the modified image.Di2015NewLine    e.Graphics.DrawImage(bmp, 0, 150);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9479865Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //  Create a FileSystemWatcher to monitor all files on drive C.Di2015NewLine        FileSystemWatcher fsw = new FileSystemWatcher("C:\\\\");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //  Watch for changes in LastAccess and LastWrite times, andDi2015NewLine        //  the renaming of files or directories. Di2015NewLine    fsw.NotifyFilter = NotifyFilters.LastAccess | NotifyFilters.LastWriteDi2015NewLine        | NotifyFilters.FileName |NotifyFilters.DirectoryName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //  Register a handler that gets called when a Di2015NewLine    //  file is created, changed, or deleted.Di2015NewLine    fsw.Changed += new FileSystemEventHandler(OnChanged);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    fsw.Created += new FileSystemEventHandler(OnChanged);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    fsw.Deleted += new FileSystemEventHandler(OnChanged);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //  Register a handler that gets called when a file is renamed.Di2015NewLine    fsw.Renamed += new RenamedEventHandler(OnRenamed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //  Register a handler that gets called if the Di2015NewLine    //  FileSystemWatcher needs to report an error.Di2015NewLine    fsw.Error += new ErrorEventHandler(OnError);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //  Begin watching.Di2015NewLine    fsw.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Press \\'Enter\\' to quit the sample.");Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//  This method is called when a file is created, changed, or deleted.Di2015NewLineprivate static void OnChanged(object source, FileSystemEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //  Show that a file has been created, changed, or deleted.Di2015NewLine    WatcherChangeTypes wct = e.ChangeType;Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("File {0} {1}", e.FullPath, wct.ToString());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//  This method is called when a file is renamed.Di2015NewLineprivate static void OnRenamed(object source, RenamedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //  Show that a file has been renamed.Di2015NewLine    WatcherChangeTypes wct = e.ChangeType;Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("File {0} {2} to {1}", e.OldFullPath, e.FullPath, wct.ToString());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//  This method is called when the FileSystemWatcher detects an error.Di2015NewLineprivate static void OnError(object source, ErrorEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //  Show that an error has been detected.Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("The FileSystemWatcher has detected an error");Di2015NewLine    //  Give more information if the error is due to an internal buffer overflow.Di2015NewLine    if (e.GetException().GetType() == typeof(InternalBufferOverflowException))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //  This can happen if Windows is reporting many file system events quickly Di2015NewLine        //  and internal buffer of the  FileSystemWatcher is not large enough to handle thisDi2015NewLine        //  rate of events. The InternalBufferOverflowException error informs the applicationDi2015NewLine        //  that some of the file system events are being lost.Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(("The file system watcher experienced an internal buffer overflow: " + e.GetException().Message));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLine        return MapRoute(routes, name, url, excludeRouteValueNames, defaults, null, namespaces);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Route MapRoute(this ArgumentNullException("routes");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (url == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("url");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Route item = new 9483508Di2015UniqueSeparatorRoute
9483508Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomRoute : RouteDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region PropertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ReadOnlyCollection<string> ExcludedRouteValuesNames { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region ConstructorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CustomRoute(string url, IRouteHandler routeHandler, string commaSeparatedRouteValueNames)Di2015NewLine        : this(url, routeHandler, (commaSeparatedRouteValueNames ?? string.Empty).Split(','))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CustomRoute(string url, IRouteHandler routeHandler, params string[] excludeRouteValuesNames)Di2015NewLine        : base(url, routeHandler)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ExcludedRouteValuesNames = new ReadOnlyCollection<string>(excludeRouteValuesNames.Select(val => val.Trim()).ToList());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Route overridesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override VirtualPathData GetVirtualPath(RequestContext requestContext, RouteValueDictionary values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (requestContext == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("requestContext");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create new route data and include only non-excluded valuesDi2015NewLine        var excludedRouteData = new RouteData(this, this.RouteHandler);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // add route valuesDi2015NewLine        requestContext.RouteData.ValuesDi2015NewLine            .Where(pair => !this.ExcludedRouteValuesNames.Contains(pair.Key, StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine            .ToList()Di2015NewLine            .ForEach(pair => excludedRouteData.Values.Add(pair.Key, pair.Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // add data tokensDi2015NewLine        requestContext.RouteData.DataTokensDi2015NewLine            .ToList()Di2015NewLine            .ForEach(pair => excludedRouteData.DataTokens.Add(pair.Key, pair.Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // intermediary request contextDi2015NewLine        var currentContext = new RequestContext(new HttpContextWrapper(HttpContext.Current), excludedRouteData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create new URL route values and include only none-excluded valuesDi2015NewLine        var excludedRouteValues = new RouteValueDictionary(Di2015NewLine            valuesDi2015NewLine                .Where(v => !this.ExcludedRouteValuesNames.Contains(v.Key, StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine                .ToDictionary(pair => pair.Key, pair => pair.Value)Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result = base.GetVirtualPath(currentContext, excludedRouteValues);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9483717Di2015UniqueSeparator/*Di2015NewLine * A function to get a Bitmap object directly from a web resourceDi2015NewLine * Author: Danny BattisonDi2015NewLine * Contact: gabehabe@googlemail.comDi2015NewLine */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Get a bitmap directly from the webDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="URL">The URL of the image</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A bitmap of the image requested</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static Bitmap BitmapFromWeb(string URL)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        // create a web request to the url of the imageDi2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest myRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(URL);Di2015NewLine        // set the method to GET to get the imageDi2015NewLine        myRequest.Method = "GET";Di2015NewLine        // get the response from the webpageDi2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse myResponse = (HttpWebResponse)myRequest.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        // create a bitmap from the stream of the responseDi2015NewLine        Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(myResponse.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLine        // close off the stream and the responseDi2015NewLine        myResponse.Close();Di2015NewLine        // return the Bitmap of the imageDi2015NewLine        return bmp;Di2015NewLine    } catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine        return null; // if for some reason we couldn't get to image, we return nullDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9499538Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ArrayExtensionsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static void Set<T>(this Array array, T defaultValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int[] indicies = new int[array.Rank];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SetDimension<T>(array, indicies, 0, defaultValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void SetDimension<T>(Array array, int[] indicies, int dimension, T defaultValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i <= array.GetUpperBound(dimension); i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                indicies[dimension] = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (dimension < array.Rank - 1)Di2015NewLine                    SetDimension<T>(array, indicies, dimension + 1, defaultValue);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    array.SetValue(defaultValue, indicies);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9500554Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RenderHandler : IObserver<IEvent<Rendering>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly SpriteBatch _spriteBatch;Di2015NewLine    private readonly IList<IEvent<Rendering>> _renderBuffer = new List<IEvent<Rendering>>();Di2015NewLine    private Game _game;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RenderHandler(Game game)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _game = game;Di2015NewLine        this._spriteBatch = new SpriteBatch(game.GraphicsDevice);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void OnNext(IEvent<Rendering> value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _renderBuffer.Add(value);Di2015NewLine        if ((value.EventArgs.When.ElapsedGameTime >= _game.TargetElapsedTime))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            OnRender(_renderBuffer);Di2015NewLine            _renderBuffer.Clear();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnRender(IEnumerable<IEvent<Rendering>> obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var renderBatches = obj.GroupBy(x => x.EventArgs.Depth)Di2015NewLine            .OrderBy(x => x.Key).ToList(); // TODO: profile if.ToList() is neededDi2015NewLine        foreach (var renderBatch in renderBatches)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _spriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode.Deferred, BlendState.AlphaBlend);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var @event in renderBatch)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                OnRender(@event.EventArgs);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            _spriteBatch.End();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnRender(Rendering draw)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _spriteBatch.Draw(Di2015NewLine            draw.Texture,Di2015NewLine            draw.Position,Di2015NewLine            null,Di2015NewLine            draw.RenderColor,Di2015NewLine            draw.Rotation ?? 0f,Di2015NewLine            draw.Origin ?? Vector2.Zero,Di2015NewLine            draw.Scale,Di2015NewLine            draw.SpriteEffects,Di2015NewLine            0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9505004Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic MyForm()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // EventHandler is defined as:Di2015NewLine    // delegate void EventHandler(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    // so its signature is equal to your delegate:Di2015NewLine    // delegate void ListenToTextBoxes(object sender, EventArgs e);Di2015NewLine    // Hence, if you receive that delegate from somewhere out, you can pass itDi2015NewLine    // to TextChange eventsDi2015NewLine    var myDelegate = new EventHandler(txt_TextChanged);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this.textBox1.TextChanged += myDelegate;Di2015NewLine    this.textBox2.TextChanged += myDelegate;Di2015NewLine    this.textBox3.TextChanged += myDelegate;Di2015NewLine    this.textBox4.TextChanged += myDelegate;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9505026Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class FrameworkElementScrollviewerScrollingBehavior : Behavior<FrameworkElement>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private FrameworkElement _AssociatedElement;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ScrollViewer _listboxScrollViewer = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region OnAttachedDi2015NewLine    protected override void onDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void _AssociatedElement_Unloaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Cleanup();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region OnDetachingDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnDetaching()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Cleanup();Di2015NewLine        base.OnDetaching();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool _isCleanedUp;Di2015NewLine    private void Cleanup()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!_isCleanedUp)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _AssociatedElement.Loaded -= OnControlLoaded;Di2015NewLine            _AssociatedElement.Unloaded -= _AssociatedElement_Unloaded;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region OnControlLoadedDi2015NewLine    private void OnControlLoaded(object sender, 9507589Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DelegateTypeFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ModuleBuilder m_module;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DelegateTypeFactory()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var assembly = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(Di2015NewLine            new AssemblyName("DelegateTypeFactory"), AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndCollect);Di2015NewLine        m_module = assembly.DefineDynamicModule("DelegateTypeFactory");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Type CreateDelegateType(MethodInfo method)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string nameBase = string.Format("{0}{1}", method.DeclaringType.Name, method.Name);Di2015NewLine        string name = GetUniqueName(nameBase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var typeBuilder = m_module.DefineType(Di2015NewLine            name, TypeAttributes.Sealed | TypeAttributes.Public, typeof(MulticastDelegate));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var constructor = typeBuilder.DefineConstructor(Di2015NewLine            MethodAttributes.RTSpecialName | MethodAttributes.HideBySig | MethodAttributes.Public,Di2015NewLine            CallingConventions.Standard, new[] { typeof(object), typeof(IntPtr) });Di2015NewLine        constructor.SetImplementationFlags(MethodImplAttributes.CodeTypeMask);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var parameters = method.GetParameters();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var invokeMethod = typeBuilder.DefineMethod(Di2015NewLine            "Invoke", MethodAttributes.HideBySig | MethodAttributes.Virtual | MethodAttributes.Public,Di2015NewLine            method.ReturnType, parameters.Select(p => p.ParameterType).ToArray());Di2015NewLine        invokeMethod.SetImplementationFlags(MethodImplAttributes.CodeTypeMask);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < parameters.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var parameter = parameters[i];Di2015NewLine            invokeMethod.DefineParameter(i + 1, ParameterAttributes.None, parameter.Name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return typeBuilder.CreateType();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string GetUniqueName(string nameBase)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int number = 2;Di2015NewLine        string name = nameBase;Di2015NewLine        while (m_module.GetType(name) != null)Di2015NewLine            name = nameBase + number++;Di2015NewLine        return name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9512178Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)        Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[,] values = {Di2015NewLine            {"x", "y", "z"},Di2015NewLine            {"a", "b", "c"},Di2015NewLine            {"0", "1", "2"}Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        values = RemoveRow(values, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int row = 0; row < values.GetLength(0); row++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int column = 0; column < values.GetLength(1); column++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(values[row, column]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string[,] RemoveRow(string[,] array, int row)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int rowCount = array.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine        int columnCount = array.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine        string[,] ret = new string[rowCount - 1, columnCount];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Array.Copy(array, 0, ret, 0, row * columnCount);Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(array, (row + 1) * columnCount,Di2015NewLine                   ret, row * columnCount, (rowCount - row - 1) * columnCount);Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9517399Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void SetIngredientsForRecipe(long recipeId, List<string> ingredients)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   using (var db = new FoodEntities(ConnectionString, null, null))Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      var recipe = db.recipe.Single(r => r.ID == recipeId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // make an array since EF4 supports the contains keyword for arraysDi2015NewLine      var ingrArr = ingredients.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // get the ids (and only the ids) of the new ingredientsDi2015NewLine      var ingrNew = new HasSet<int>(db.ingrediantsDi2015NewLine        .Where(i => ingrArr.Contains(i.Name))Di2015NewLine        .Select(i => I.Id));   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // get the ids (again only the ids) of the current receipeDi2015NewLine      var curIngr = new HasSet<int>(db.receipesDi2015NewLine        .Where(r => r.Id == recipeId)Di2015NewLine        .SelectMany(r => r.ingredients)Di2015NewLine        .Select(i => I.Id));        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // use the build in hash set functions to get the ingredients to add / remove            Di2015NewLine      var toAdd = ingrNew.ExpectWith(curIngr);Di2015NewLine      var toRemove = curIngr.ExpectWith(ingrNew);   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      foreach (var id in toAdd)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // mock the ingredients rather than fetching them, for relations only the id needs to be thereDi2015NewLine        recipe.ingredients.Add(new Ingredient()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          Id = idDi2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      foreach (var id in toRemove)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // again mock onlyDi2015NewLine        recipe.ingredients.Remove(new Ingredient()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          Id = idDi2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      db.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9518833Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate int[] getPoints(int perc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] pts;// = new int[4];Di2015NewLine        double x_offset_left = (35 - 21);Di2015NewLine        x_offset_left = x_offset_left / 100;Di2015NewLine        double height = 135;Di2015NewLine        double width = 178;Di2015NewLine        double x1, x2, y1, y2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int margin_top = 66;//68Di2015NewLine        int margin_left = 21;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        y1 = ((height / 100) * perc) + margin_top;Di2015NewLine        y2 = y1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x1 = margin_left + (x_offset_left * perc);Di2015NewLine        x2 = width - (x_offset_left * perc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        pts = new int[4] { Convert.ToInt32(x1), Convert.ToInt32(y1), Convert.ToInt32(x2), Convert.ToInt32(y2) };Di2015NewLine        return pts;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private Bitmap drawBucket2(int yellowval, int redval, int overval)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Bitmap img = new Bitmap(200, 221);Di2015NewLine        using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(img))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Brush bRed = new SolidBrush(Color.FromArgb(50, Color.DarkRed));Di2015NewLine            Brush bYellow = new SolidBrush(Color.FromArgb(75, Color.Gold));Di2015NewLine            Brush bBlue = new SolidBrush(Color.FromArgb(50, Color.Blue));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            GraphicsPath gp = new GraphicsPath();Di2015NewLine            Region r;Di2015NewLine            Point[] points_yellow;Di2015NewLine            Point[] points_red;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int percentage = 0;Di2015NewLine            int[] pts;Di2015NewLine            int[] pts_full = getPoints(100);Di2015NewLine            int[] pts_min = getPoints(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #region "Yellow Region"Di2015NewLine            // bottom curveDi2015NewLine            percentage = yellowval;Di2015NewLine            pts = getPoints(100 - percentage);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            points_yellow = new Point[3];Di2015NewLine            points_yellow[0] = new Point(pts_full[0], pts_full[3]);Di2015NewLine            points_yellow[1] = new Point(((pts_full[2] - pts_full[0]) / 2 + pts_full[0]), (pts_full[1] + 15));Di2015NewLine            points_yellow[2] = new Point(pts_full[2], pts_full[3]);Di2015NewLine            gp.AddCurve(points_yellow, 0.7f);Di2015NewLine            //Console.WriteLine("curve : (" + points_yellow[0].X + ", " + points_yellow[0].Y + "), " + " (" + points_yellow[1].X + ", " + points_yellow[1].Y + "), " + " (" + points_yellow[2].X + ", " + points_yellow[2].Y + ")");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //polygonDi2015NewLine            points_yellow = new Point[4];Di2015NewLine            points_yellow[0] = new Point(pts[0], pts[1]);Di2015NewLine            points_yellow[1] = new Point(pts[2], pts[1]);Di2015NewLine            points_yellow[2] = new Point(pts_full[2], pts_full[1]);Di2015NewLine            points_yellow[3] = new Point(pts_full[0], pts_full[1]);Di2015NewLine            gp.AddPolygon(points_yellow);Di2015NewLine            //Console.WriteLine("Poly : (" + points_yellow[0].X + ", " + points_yellow[0].Y + "), " + " (" + points_yellow[1].X + ", " + points_yellow[1].Y + "), " + " (" + points_yellow[2].X + ", " + points_yellow[2].Y + "), " + " (" + points_yellow[3].X + ", " + points_yellow[3].Y + ")");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // top curveDi2015NewLine            points_yellow = new Point[3];Di2015NewLine            points_yellow[0] = new Point(pts[0], pts[1]);Di2015NewLine            points_yellow[1] = new Point(((pts[2] - pts[0]) / 2 + pts[0]), (pts[1] + 15));Di2015NewLine            points_yellow[2] = new Point(pts[2], pts[1]);Di2015NewLine            gp.AddCurve(points_yellow, 0.7f);Di2015NewLine            //Console.WriteLine("curve : (" + points_yellow[0].X + ", " + points_yellow[0].Y + "), " + " (" + points_yellow[1].X + ", " + points_yellow[1].Y + "), " + " (" + points_yellow[2].X + ", " + points_yellow[2].Y + ")");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            r = new Region(gp);Di2015NewLine            g.FillRegion(bYellow, r);Di2015NewLine            #endregion     Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #region "Red Region"Di2015NewLine            gp = new GraphicsPath();Di2015NewLine            percentage = yellowval + redval;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Bottom CurveDi2015NewLine            gp.AddCurve(points_yellow, 0.7f);Di2015NewLine            //Console.WriteLine("curve : (" + points_yellow[0].X + ", " + points_yellow[0].Y + "), " + " (" + points_yellow[1].X + ", " + points_yellow[1].Y + "), " + " (" + points_yellow[2].X + ", " + points_yellow[2].Y + ")");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // polygonDi2015NewLine            int[] pts_yel = new int[3]{pts[0], pts[1], pts[2]};Di2015NewLine            pts = getPoints(100 - percentage);Di2015NewLine            points_red = new Point[4];Di2015NewLine            points_red[0] = new Point(pts[0], pts[1]);Di2015NewLine            points_red[1] = new Point(pts[2], pts[1]);Di2015NewLine            points_red[2] = new Point(pts_yel[2], pts_yel[1]);Di2015NewLine            points_red[3] = new Point(pts_yel[0], pts_yel[1]);Di2015NewLine            gp.AddPolygon(points_red);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Top CurveDi2015NewLine            points_red = new Point[3];Di2015NewLine            points_red[0] = new Point(pts[0], pts[1]);Di2015NewLine            points_red[1] = new Point(((pts[2] - pts[0]) / 2 + pts[0]), (pts[1] + 12));Di2015NewLine            points_red[2] = new Point(pts[2], pts[1]);Di2015NewLine            gp.AddCurve(points_red, 0.7f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            r = new Region(gp);Di2015NewLine            g.FillRegion(bRed, r);Di2015NewLine            #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #region "Overflow"Di2015NewLine            if (overval > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                gp = new GraphicsPath();Di2015NewLine                gp.AddEllipse(16, 10, 165, 32);Di2015NewLine                r = new Region(gp);Di2015NewLine                g.FillRegion(bBlue, r);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            #endregionDi2015NewLine            r.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            gp.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            bRed.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            bYellow.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            bBlue.Dispose();            Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return img;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void fillBucket(int Yellowperc, int Redperc, int Overperc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pictureBox1.Image = null;Di2015NewLine        pictureBox1.Image = drawBucket2(Yellowperc, Redperc, Overperc);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9518974Di2015UniqueSeparator    public List<T> FindAllInstances<T>(object value) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HashSet<object> exploredObjects = new HashSet<object>();Di2015NewLine        List<T> found = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FindAllInstances(value, exploredObjects, found);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return found;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void FindAllInstances<T>(object value, HashSet<object> exploredObjects, List<T> found) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (exploredObjects.Contains(value))Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        exploredObjects.Add(value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IEnumerable enumerable = value as IEnumerable;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (enumerable != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach(object item in enumerable)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FindAllInstances<T>(item, exploredObjects, found);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T possibleMatch = value as T;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (possibleMatch != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                found.Add(possibleMatch);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Type type = value.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PropertyInfo[] properties = type.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.GetProperty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach(PropertyInfo property in properties)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object propertyValue = property.GetValue(value, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                FindAllInstances<T>(propertyValue, exploredObjects, found);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void TestIt()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Analyzed analyzed = new Analyzed()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            EasyOne = new Target(),Di2015NewLine            ABitMoreTricky = new List<Target>() { new Target() },Di2015NewLine            Nightmare = new List<Tuple<string, Target>>() { new Tuple<string, Target>("", new Target()) }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<Target> found = FindAllInstances<Target>(analyzed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(found.Count.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9521252Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate double GetSignalAmplitude(byte[] signal)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int BytesInSample = 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int signalSize = signal.Length / BytesInSample;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double Sum = 0.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < signalSize; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int sample = Math.Abs(BitConverter.ToInt16(signal, i * BytesInSample));Di2015NewLine        Sum += sample;Di2015NewLine    }            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double amplitude = Sum / signalSize; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return amplitude;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9523428Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunction HexToBinShort(hex:integer):string;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  case hex ofDi2015NewLine    0:  result:='0000';  //convert each hex digit to binary stringDi2015NewLine    1:  result:='0001';  //could do this with high-nybble and low nybbleDi2015NewLine    2:  result:='0010';  //of each sequential byte in the array (mask and bit shift)Di2015NewLine    3:  result:='0011';  //ie: binstring:=binstring + HexToBinShort(nybble[i])Di2015NewLine    4:  result:='0100';  //but must count DOWN for i (start with MSB!)Di2015NewLine    5:  result:='0101';Di2015NewLine    6:  result:='0110';Di2015NewLine    7:  result:='0111';Di2015NewLine    8:  result:='1000';Di2015NewLine    9:  result:='1001';Di2015NewLine    10: result:='1010';Di2015NewLine    11: result:='1011';Di2015NewLine    12: result:='1100';Di2015NewLine    13: result:='1101';Di2015NewLine    14: result:='1110';Di2015NewLine    15: result:='1111';Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLine
9523428Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunction BinToIntString(binstring:string):string;Di2015NewLinevar i, j : integer;Di2015NewLinevar calcHold, calc2 :string;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  calc2:=binstring[Length(binstring)];   // first bit is easy 0 or 1Di2015NewLine  for i := (Length(binstring) - 1) downto 1 do begin       Di2015NewLine    if binstring[i] = '1' then begin   Di2015NewLine       calcHold:=generateCard(Length(binstring)-i);Di2015NewLine       calc2 := AddDecimalStrings(calcHold, calc2);Di2015NewLine    end;Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLine  result:=calc2;Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLine
9523428Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunction generateCard(i:integer):string;Di2015NewLinevar j : integer;Di2015NewLinevar outVal : string;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  outVal := '2';Di2015NewLine  if i > 1 then beginDi2015NewLine    for j := 2 to i do beginDi2015NewLine      outVal:= MulByTwo(outVal);Di2015NewLine    end;Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLine  result := outVal;Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLine
9523428Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunction MulByTwo(val:string):string;Di2015NewLinevar i : integer;Di2015NewLinevar carry, hold : integer;Di2015NewLinevar outHold : string;Di2015NewLinevar outString :string;Di2015NewLinevar outString2 : string;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  outString:= StringOfChar('0', Length(val) + 1);Di2015NewLine  outString2:= StringOfChar('0', Length(val));Di2015NewLine  carry :=0;Di2015NewLine  for i := Length(val) downto 1 do beginDi2015NewLine    hold := StrToInt(val[i]) * 2 + carry;Di2015NewLine    if hold >= 10 then beginDi2015NewLine      carry := 1;Di2015NewLine      hold := hold - 10;Di2015NewLine    end else beginDi2015NewLine      carry := 0;Di2015NewLine    end;Di2015NewLine    outHold := IntToStr(hold);Di2015NewLine    outString[i+1] := outHold[1];Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLine  if carry = 1 then beginDi2015NewLine    outString[1] := '1';Di2015NewLine    result := outString;Di2015NewLine  end else beginDi2015NewLine    for i := 1 to length(outString2) do outString2[i]:=outString[i+1];Di2015NewLine    result := outString2;Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLineend; Di2015NewLine
9523428Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunction AddDecimalStrings(val1, val2:string):string;Di2015NewLinevar i,j :integer;Di2015NewLinevar carry, hold, largest: integer;Di2015NewLinevar outString, outString2, bigVal, smVal, outHold:string;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  if Length(val1) > Length(val2) then beginDi2015NewLine    largest:= Length(val1);Di2015NewLine    bigVal := val1;Di2015NewLine    smVal := StringOfChar('0', largest);Di2015NewLine    j:=1;Di2015NewLine    for i := (largest - length(val2) +1) to largest do beginDi2015NewLine      smVal[i] := val2[j];Di2015NewLine      j:=j+1;Di2015NewLine    end;Di2015NewLine  end else beginDi2015NewLine    if length(val2) > Length(val1) then beginDi2015NewLine      largest:=Length(val2);Di2015NewLine      bigVal:=val2;Di2015NewLine      smVal := StringOfChar('0', largest);Di2015NewLine      j:=1;Di2015NewLine      for i := (largest - length(val1) +1) to largest do beginDi2015NewLine        smVal[i] := val1[j];Di2015NewLine        j:=j+1;Di2015NewLine      end;Di2015NewLine    end else beginDi2015NewLine      largest:=length(val1);Di2015NewLine      bigVal:=val1;Di2015NewLine      smVal:=val2;Di2015NewLine    end;Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLine  carry:=0;Di2015NewLine  outString:=StringOfChar('0', largest +1);Di2015NewLine  outString2:=StringOfChar('0', largest);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for i := largest downto 1 do beginDi2015NewLine    hold := StrToInt(bigVal[i]) + StrToInt(smVal[i]) + carry;Di2015NewLine    if hold >=10 then beginDi2015NewLine      carry:=1;Di2015NewLine      hold := hold - 10;Di2015NewLine    end else beginDi2015NewLine      carry:=0;Di2015NewLine    end;Di2015NewLine    outHold:= IntToStr(hold);Di2015NewLine    outString[i+1]:=outHold[1];Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if carry = 1 then beginDi2015NewLine    outString[1] := '1';Di2015NewLine    result := outString;Di2015NewLine  end else beginDi2015NewLine    for i := 1 to length(outString2) do outString2[i]:=outString[i+1];Di2015NewLine    result := outString2;Di2015NewLine  end;  Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLine
9523428Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunction DivByTwo(val:string):string;Di2015NewLinevar i : integer;Di2015NewLinevar hold : integer;Di2015NewLinevar outHold : string;Di2015NewLinevar outString, outString2 :string;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  outString:=StringOfChar('0',Length(val));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for i := Length(val) downto 1 do beginDi2015NewLine    if StrToInt(val[i]) mod 2 = 0 then beginDi2015NewLine      hold:= Math.Floor(StrToInt(val[i]) / 2);Di2015NewLine      outHold:= IntToStr(hold);Di2015NewLine      outString[i]:=outHold[1];Di2015NewLine    end else beginDi2015NewLine      hold:= Math.Floor((StrToInt(val[i]) - 1) / 2);Di2015NewLine      outHold:=IntToStr(hold);Di2015NewLine      outString[i]:= outHold[1];Di2015NewLine      if i <> Length(val) then beginDi2015NewLine        hold:= StrToInt(outString[i+1]) + 5;Di2015NewLine        outHold:= IntToStr(hold);Di2015NewLine        outString[i+1] := outHold[1];Di2015NewLine      end;Di2015NewLine    end;Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLine  outString2:=StringOfChar('0',Length(val)-1);Di2015NewLine  if (outString[1] = '0') and (length(outString) > 1) then beginDi2015NewLine    for i := 1 to length(outString2) do outString2[i]:=outString[i+1];Di2015NewLine    result:=outString2;Di2015NewLine  end else beginDi2015NewLine    result:=outString;Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLine

i < source.Columns.Count - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dest.Rows.Add(dest.NewRow());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int r = 0; r < dest.Rows.Count;
