9535775Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<decimal> ExtractNumbers(string s)Di2015NewLine{                                                  // For s = "CC77X1722X12"Di2015NewLine    string[] nums = s.Substring(2).Split('X');     // nums = ["77", "1722", "12"];Di2015NewLine    return nums.Select(num => decimal.Parse(num)); // returns [77, 1722, 12]Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9535775Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<decimal> ExtractNumbers(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] nums = s.Substring(2).Split('X');Di2015NewLine    return numsDi2015NewLine        .Select(num => {Di2015NewLine                decimal d;Di2015NewLine                if (decimal.Parse(num, out d))Di2015NewLine                    return new {Number = d, Succeeded = true};Di2015NewLine                return new {Number = 0, Succeeded = false};Di2015NewLine            })Di2015NewLine        .Filter(result => result.Succeeded)Di2015NewLine        .Select(result => result.Number);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9537842Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PropertyUpdaterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static PropertyUpdater<T> Update<T>(T objectToUpdate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return PropertyUpdater<T>.Update(objectToUpdate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PropertyUpdater<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly T destination;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private PropertyUpdater(T destination)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.destination = destination;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static PropertyUpdater<T> Update(T objectToUpdate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new PropertyUpdater<T>(objectToUpdate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void With(T objectToCopyFrom)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] properties = typeof(T).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo p in properties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Only copy properties with public get and set methodsDi2015NewLine            if (!p.CanRead || !p.CanWrite || p.GetGetMethod(false) == null || p.GetSetMethod(false) == null) continue;Di2015NewLine            // Skip indexersDi2015NewLine            if (p.GetGetMethod(false).GetParameters().Length > 0) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            p.SetValue(this.destination, p.GetValue(objectToCopyFrom, null), null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9539738Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IsGenericTypeOf(this Type t, Type genericDefinition)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type[] parameters = null;Di2015NewLine    return IsGenericTypeOf(t, genericDefinition, out parameters);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static bool IsGenericTypeOf(this Type t, Type genericDefinition, out Type[] genericParameters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    genericParameters = new Type[] { };Di2015NewLine    if (!genericDefinition.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var isMatch = t.IsGenericType && t.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == genericDefinition.GetGenericTypeDefinition();Di2015NewLine    if (!isMatch && t.BaseType != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        isMatch = IsGenericTypeOf(t.BaseType, genericDefinition, out genericParameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (!isMatch && genericDefinition.IsInterface && t.GetInterfaces().Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var i in t.GetInterfaces())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i.IsGenericTypeOf(genericDefinition, out genericParameters))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                isMatch = true;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (isMatch && !genericParameters.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        genericParameters = t.GetGenericArguments();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return isMatch;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9541064Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool DeleteDirectories(string root)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool removed = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var dirs = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLine    var emptyDirStack = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLine    var emptyDirs = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!System.IO.Directory.Exists(root))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    dirs.Push(root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (dirs.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string currentDir = dirs.Pop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] subDirs;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            subDirs = System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories(currentDir);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (UnauthorizedAccessException e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(e.Message);Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(e.Message);Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Directory.GetFiles(currentDir).Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            emptyDirStack.Push(currentDir);Di2015NewLine            emptyDirs.Add(currentDir, subDirs.Length); // add directory path and number of sub directoriesDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Push the subdirectories onto the stack for traversal.Di2015NewLine        foreach (string str in subDirs)Di2015NewLine            dirs.Push(str);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (emptyDirStack.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        string currentDir = emptyDirStack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        if (emptyDirs[currentDir] == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string parentDir = Directory.GetParent(currentDir).FullName;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(currentDir); // comment this lineDi2015NewLine            //Directory.Delete(currentDir); // uncomment this line to deleteDi2015NewLine            if (emptyDirs.ContainsKey(parentDir))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                emptyDirs[parentDir]--; // decrement number of subdirectories of parentDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            removed = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return removed;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9541143Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UtcModelBinder : DefaultModelBinderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  protected override void SetProperty(ControllerContext controllerContext, ModelBindingContext bindingContext, System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor, object value)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    HttpRequestBase request = controllerContext.HttpContext.Request;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Detect if this is a JSON requestDi2015NewLine    if (request.IsAjaxRequest() &&Di2015NewLine      request.ContentType.StartsWith("application/json", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // See if the value is a DateTimeDi2015NewLine      if (value is DateTime)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // This is double casting, but since it's a value type there's not much other things we can doDi2015NewLine        DateTime dateValue = (DateTime)value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (dateValue.Kind == DateTimeKind.Local)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          // Change itDi2015NewLine          DateTime utcDate = dateValue.ToUniversalTime();Di2015NewLine          if (!propertyDescriptor.IsReadOnly && propertyDescriptor.PropertyType == typeof(DateTime))Di2015NewLine            propertyDescriptor.SetValue(bindingContext.Model, utcDate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Fall back to the default behaviorDi2015NewLine    base.SetProperty(controllerContext, bindingContext, propertyDescriptor, value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9544168Di2015UniqueSeparatorHandleRpcRequest
9544168Di2015UniqueSeparatorDbRequestProxy
9544168Di2015UniqueSeparatorManualResetEvent
9544168Di2015UniqueSeparator_safeForNewThread
9544168Di2015UniqueSeparatorJoin
9544168Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ClientHandler {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static ManualResetEvent _safeForNewThread = new ManualResetEvent(true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void HandleRpcRequest(string request)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Thread rpcThread = new Thread(delegate()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DbRequestProxy dbRequest = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.BeginThreadAffinity();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string response = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Creates a COM object. The VB6 runtime initializes itself here.Di2015NewLine                // Other threads can be executing here at the same time without fearDi2015NewLine                // of a deadlock, because the VB6 runtime lock is re-entrant.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                dbRequest = new DbRequestProxy();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Call the COM objectDi2015NewLine                response = dbRequest.ProcessDBRequest(request);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Send response back to clientDi2015NewLine                _messenger.Send(Messages.RpcResponse(response), true);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _messenger.Send(Messages.Error(ex.ToString()));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (dbRequest != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Force release of COM objects and VB6 globalsDi2015NewLine                    // to prevent a different deadlock scenario with VB6Di2015NewLine                    // and the .NET garbage collector/finalizer threadsDi2015NewLine                    dbRequest.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Other request threads cannot start right now, becauseDi2015NewLine                // we're exiting this thread, which will detach the VB6 runtimeDi2015NewLine                // when the underlying native thread exitsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _safeForNewThread.Reset();Di2015NewLine                Thread.EndThreadAffinity();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Make sure we can start a new thread (i.e. another threadDi2015NewLine        // isn't in the middle of exiting...)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _safeForNewThread.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Put the thread into an STA, start it up, and wait forDi2015NewLine        // it to end. If other requests come in, they'll get pickedDi2015NewLine        // up by other thread-pool threads, so we won't usually be blocking anyoneDi2015NewLine        // by doing this (although we are blocking a thread-pool thread, soDi2015NewLine        // hopefully we don't block for *too* long).Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        rpcThread.SetApartmentState(ApartmentState.STA);Di2015NewLine        rpcThread.Start();Di2015NewLine        rpcThread.Join();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Since we've joined the thread, we know at this pointDi2015NewLine        // that any DLL_THREAD_DETACH notifications have been handledDi2015NewLine        // and that the underlying native thread has completely terminated.Di2015NewLine        // Hence, other threads can safely be started.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _safeForNewThread.Set();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9544229Di2015UniqueSeparatordt.Rows.Add(1);Di2015NewLineint insertedValue = 1;Di2015NewLinevar result = Di2015NewLine        dt.AsEnumerable().Where( dr => dr.Field<int>( "ID" ) == insertedValue );Di2015NewLine

         parameter = orgDa.SelectCommand.CreateParameter();Di2015NewLine            parameter.ParameterName = "@deptID";Di2015NewLine            parameter.Value = id;Di2015NewLine 9544818Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar _sale = from emp in setupEmployeesDi2015NewLine            join sales in vwSaleTargets on emp.EmployeeID equals sales.EmployeeIDDi2015NewLine            join price in vwPeriodPricingsDi2015NewLine               on new { sales.SKUID, sales.PeriodID } Di2015NewLine               equals new { SKUID = (int?)price.SKUID, PeriodID = (int?)price.PeriodID }Di2015NewLine            join sk in setupSKUs on sales.SKUID equals sk.SKUIDDi2015NewLine            where emp.EmployeeID == 123 && sales.StartDate.Year == 2012 && sales.StartDate.Month == 2Di2015NewLine            select new Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                EmployeeName = emp.EmployeeName, Di2015NewLine                StartDate = sales.StartDate,Di2015NewLine                SalesQuantity = sales.SalesQuantity, Di2015NewLine                ExFactoryPrice = price.ExFactoryPrice, Di2015NewLine                SKUID = sk.SKUID,Di2015NewLine                SKUName = sk.SKUName Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar lstSale = _sale.ToList(); //to avoid n+1 queries in case of groupingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Run through lstSale hereDi2015NewLineforeach(var item in lstSale)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine(item);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar sale2 = from x in lstSaleDi2015NewLine            group x by new { x.SKUID, x.EmployeeName } into groupingDi2015NewLine            select new Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                 EmployeeName = grouping.Key.EmployeeName,Di2015NewLine                 SKUID = grouping.Key.SKUID,Di2015NewLine                 SKUName = grouping.SKUName,Di2015NewLine                 MonthSale =(double?)groupingDi2015NewLine                          .Where(x => x.StartDate.Month == 2 && Di2015NewLine                                      x.StartDate.Year == 2012)Di2015NewLine                          .Select(t=>t.SalesQuantity)Di2015NewLine                          .Sum(t=>t.Value)?? 0,Di2015NewLine                 MonthSaleValue = (double?)groupingDi2015NewLine                          .Where(x => x.StartDate.Month == 2 && Di2015NewLine                                      x.StartDate.Year == 2012)Di2015NewLine                          .Sum(x => x.SalesQuantity * x.ExFactoryPrice)  Di2015NewLine                             ?? 0,Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(sale2.OrderBy(x => x.SKUName).ToList());Di2015NewLine

9544862Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar request = WebRequest.CreateHttp("http://localhost:1398/home/upload");Di2015NewLinerequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLinerequest.BeginGetRequestStream(ar =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var r = (HttpWebRequest)ar.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine    // create some XML document to send to the serverDi2015NewLine    var doc = XDocument.Parse("<root>Value</root>");Di2015NewLine    using (var stream = r.EndGetRequestStream(ar))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        doc.Save(stream);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    r.BeginGetResponse(asyncState =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var req = (HttpWebRequest)asyncState.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine        using (var response = req.EndGetResponse(asyncState))Di2015NewLine        using (var responseStream = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = new StreamReader(responseStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var result = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // TODO: do something with the server responseDi2015NewLine            Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(() =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                textBlock.Text = result;Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }, r);Di2015NewLine}, request);Di2015NewLine
